12674645Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int BinaryFirstIndexOf<T>(Di2015NewLine    Func<int, T> indexer,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, boo> predicate,Di2015NewLine    int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var low = 0;Di2015NewLine    var high = count - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (low < (high - 1))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var mid = low + ((high - low) / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (predicate(indexer(mid))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            high = mid;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            low = mid;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (predicate(indexer(low)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return low;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (low != high && predicate(indexer(high)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return high;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return -1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12674645Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar time = DateTime.Now.AddDays(-1);Di2015NewLinevar c = scan.Entries;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar first = BinaryFirstIndexOf(Di2015NewLine     i => c[i], Di2015NewLine     e => e.TimeGenerated > time,Di2015NewLine     c.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (first >= 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<Item>(c.Count - first);Di2015NewLine    Enumerable.Range(first, c.Count - first).AsParallel()Di2015NewLine    .ForAll(i => Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var j = i - first;Di2015NewLine            result[j] = (Item)c[i];Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12676973Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void btnMonitor_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var proc = Process.GetProcesses().Where(p => p.ProcessName.IndexOf(this.txtProcessName.Text) > -1);Di2015NewLine        var k = 1;Di2015NewLine        var appendSuffix = proc.Count() > 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.pcs = new List<PerformanceCounter>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var p in proc)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.pcs.Add(new PerformanceCounter(Di2015NewLine                "Process",Di2015NewLine                "% Processor Time",Di2015NewLine                appendSuffix ? string.Format("{0}#{1}", p.ProcessName, k) : p.ProcessName,Di2015NewLine                true));Di2015NewLine            this.lstbxPC.Items.Add(appendSuffix ? string.Format("{0}#{1}", p.ProcessName, k) : p.ProcessName);Di2015NewLine            k++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.checkProcess = new Thread(this.CheckProcess);Di2015NewLine        this.checkProcess.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CheckProcess()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var temp = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var pc in this.pcs)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var nextValue = pc.NextValue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (temp < nextValue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    temp = (int)nextValue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Set the label in a ThreadSafe way. This does work.Di2015NewLine            SetControlPropertyThreadSafe(lblCPU, "Text", Convert.ToString(temp) + "%");Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12683162Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable AsDataTable(XElement root, string tableName, IDictionary<string, Type> typeMapping)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var table = new DataTable(tableName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // set up the schema based on the first rowDi2015NewLine    XNamespace dt = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:datatypes";Di2015NewLine    var columns =Di2015NewLine       (from e in root.Element(tableName).Elements()Di2015NewLine        let typeName = (string)e.Element(dt + "dt")Di2015NewLine        let type = typeMapping.ContainsKey(typeName ?? "") ? typeMapping[typeName] : typeof(string)Di2015NewLine        select new DataColumn(e.Name.LocalName, type)).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    table.Columns.AddRange(columns);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // add the rowsDi2015NewLine    foreach (var rowElement in root.Elements(tableName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var row = table.NewRow();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var column in columns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var colElement = rowElement.Element(column.ColumnName);Di2015NewLine            if (colElement != null)Di2015NewLine                row[column.ColumnName] = Convert.ChangeType((string)colElement, column.DataType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        table.Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return table;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

VideoThumbnailerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------* Di2015NewLine     * CLASSE WINDOW1 Di2015NewLine    /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ Di2015NewLine    public ref class Window1 : WindowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Inheritable attached dependency property indicates whether processing is going on Di2015NewLine    public:Di2015NewLine        static bool GetProcessing(DependencyObject ^obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        obj->SetValue(ProcessingProperty, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        static initonly DependencyProperty ^ProcessingProperty = DependencyProperty::RegisterAttached("Processing", String::typeid, Window1::typeid);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Member variables Di2015NewLine    private:Di2015NewLine        MediaPlayer ^_mediaPlayer;Di2015NewLine        Queue<TimeSpan> ^_positionsToThumbnail;Di2015NewLine        //private TimeSpan _positionsToThumbnail = new TimeSpan(); Di2015NewLine        DispatcherTimer ^_watchdogTimer;Di2015NewLine        array<Byte> ^framePixels;Di2015NewLine        array<Byte> ^previousFramePixels;Di2015NewLine        float m_iContrast;Di2015NewLine        int m_iBrightness;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public:Di2015NewLine        Window1()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Initialize window and hook up to events of interest Di2015NewLine            InitializeInstanceFields();Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine            _mediaPlayer->MediaOpened += gcnew EventHandler(this, &Window1::HandleMediaPlayerMediaOpened);Di2015NewLine            _mediaPlayer->Changed += gcnew EventHandler(this, &Window1::HandleMediaPlayerChanged);Di2015NewLine            _watchdogTimer->Interval = TimeSpan::FromSeconds(1);Di2015NewLine            _watchdogTimer->Tick += gcnew EventHandler(this, &Window1::HandleWatchdogTimerTick);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#pragma region Utils Di2015NewLine    private:Di2015NewLine        void SeekToNextThumbnailPosition()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If more frames remain to capture... Di2015NewLine            if (0 < _positionsToThumbnail->Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Seek to next position and start watchdog timer Di2015NewLine                _mediaPlayer->Position = _positionsToThumbnail->Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                _watchdogTimer->Start();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Done; close media file and stop processing Di2015NewLine                _mediaPlayer->Close();Di2015NewLine                framePixels = nullptr;Di2015NewLine                previousFramePixels = nullptr;Di2015NewLine                SetProcessing(this, false);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void CaptureCurrentFrame(bool forceCapture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Capture the current frame as an ImageSource Di2015NewLine            WriteableBitmap ^imageSource = RenderBitmapAndCapturePixels(framePixels);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If captured pixels are different than the previous frame... Di2015NewLine            if (forceCapture || !framePixels->SequenceEqual(previousFramePixels))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Stop the watchdog timer Di2015NewLine                _watchdogTimer->Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Add an Image for the Thumbnail Di2015NewLine                ThumbnailPanel::Children->Clear(); // en effaÃÂ§ant a chaque fois, on rÃÂ©ÃÂ©crit au mÃÂªme endroitDi2015NewLine                ThumbnailPanel::Children->Add(gcnew Image {Source = imageSource, ToolTip = _mediaPlayer->Position, MaxWidth = _mediaPlayer->NaturalVideoWidth, MaxHeight = _mediaPlayer->NaturalVideoHeight, Margin = Thickness(0)}); // distance entre chaque imageDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Swap the pixel buffers (moves current to previous and avoids allocating a new buffer for current) Di2015NewLine                array<Byte> ^tempPixels = framePixels;Di2015NewLine                framePixels = previousFramePixels;Di2015NewLine                previousFramePixels = tempPixels;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Seek to the next thumbnail position Di2015NewLine                SeekToNextThumbnailPosition();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WriteableBitmap ^RenderBitmapAndCapturePixels(array<Byte> ^pixels)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Render the current frame into a bitmap Di2015NewLine            DrawingVisual ^drawingVisual = gcnew DrawingVisual();Di2015NewLine            RenderTargetBitmap ^renderTargetBitmap = gcnew RenderTargetBitmap(_mediaPlayer->NaturalVideoWidth, _mediaPlayer->NaturalVideoHeight, 96, 96, PixelFormats::Default);Di2015NewLine            Rect videoRect = Rect(0, 0, _mediaPlayer->NaturalVideoWidth, _mediaPlayer->NaturalVideoHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//C# TO C++ CONVERTER NOTE: The following 'using' block is replaced by its C++ equivalent:Di2015NewLine//          using (var drawingContext = drawingVisual.RenderOpen())Di2015NewLine            System::Windows::Media::DrawingContext ^drawingContext = drawingVisual->RenderOpen();Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                drawingContext->DrawVideo(_mediaPlayer, videoRect);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                delete drawingContext;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            renderTargetBitmap->Render(drawingVisual);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Copy the pixels to the specified location Di2015NewLine            renderTargetBitmap->CopyPixels(pixels, _mediaPlayer->NaturalVideoWidth * 4, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Effectuer un traitement Di2015NewLine            TraiterImage(pixels);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Utiliser un "WritableBitMap" Di2015NewLine            WriteableBitmap ^wrBitMap = gcnew WriteableBitmap(renderTargetBitmap);Di2015NewLine            Int32Rect wrRect = Int32Rect();Di2015NewLine            wrRect.X = safe_cast<int>(videoRect.X);Di2015NewLine            wrRect.Y = safe_cast<int>(videoRect.Y);Di2015NewLine            wrRect.Width = safe_cast<int>(videoRect.Width);Di2015NewLine            wrRect.Height = safe_cast<int>(videoRect.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            wrBitMap->WritePixels(wrRect, pixels, _mediaPlayer->NaturalVideoWidth * 4, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Return the bitmap Di2015NewLine            return wrBitMap;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void TraiterImage(array<Byte> ^pixels)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < pixels->Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    double tempPixel = pixels[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    tempPixel = (pixels[i] + m_iBrightness) * m_iContrast;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (tempPixel < 0)Di2015NewLine                        tempPixel = 0;Di2015NewLine                    else if (tempPixel > 255)Di2015NewLine                        tempPixel = 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    pixels[i] = Convert::ToByte(tempPixel);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ^e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console::WriteLine("Une exception c'est produite : " + e->ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine#pragma endregion Di2015NewLine#pragma region Events Di2015NewLine        void but_brightnessDown_Click(Object ^sender, RoutedEventArgs ^e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_iBrightness > -255)Di2015NewLine                m_iBrightness -= 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lb_brightnessValue->Content = m_iBrightness;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void but_brightnessUp_Click(Object ^sender, RoutedEventArgs ^e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_iBrightness < 255)Di2015NewLine lb_contrastValue->Content = m_iContrast;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void but_contrastUp_Click(Object ^sender, RoutedEventArgs ^e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_iContrast < 2)Di2015NewLine                m_iContrast += 0.5F;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lb_contrastValue->Content = m_iContrast;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#pragma endregion Di2015NewLine#pragma region handle Di2015NewLine        void HandleWatchdogTimerTick(Object ^sender, EventArgs ^e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Stop the watchdog timer Di2015NewLine            _watchdogTimer->Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Capture the current frame (even if it's not different than the previous) Di2015NewLine            CaptureCurrentFrame(true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void HandleOpenFileButtonClick(Object ^sender, RoutedEventArgs ^e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Display open file dialog Di2015NewLine            OpenFileDialog ^openFileDialog = gcnew OpenFileDialog {CheckFileExists = true, Filter = "Video Files (*.wmv;*.dvr-ms;*.mpeg;*.mpg;*.avi)|*.wmv;*.dvr-ms;*.mpeg;*.mpg;*.avi|All Files (*)|*"};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Show dialog Di2015NewLine            System::Nullable<System::Boolean> Di2015NewLine            System::Double totalMilliseconds = _mediaPlayer->NaturalDuration.TimeSpan::TotalMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine//C# TO C++ CONVERTER TODO TASK: There is no equivalent to implicit typing in C++ unless the C++11 inferred typing option is selected:Di2015NewLine            var numberFramesToThumbnail = 1 * totalMilliseconds / 67; // le vidÃÂ©o sera jouÃÂ© Ã  8 frame par secondeDi2015NewLine            framePixels = gcnew array<Byte>(_mediaPlayer->NaturalVideoWidth * _mediaPlayer->NaturalVideoHeight * 4);Di2015NewLine            previousFramePixels = gcnew array<Byte>(framePixels->Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Enqueue a position for each frame (at the center of each of the N segments) Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < numberFramesToThumbnail; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _positionsToThumbnail->Enqueue(TimeSpan::FromMilliseconds((((2 * i) + 1) * totalMilliseconds) / (2 * numberFramesToThumbnail)));Di2015NewLine                //_positionsToThumbnail = (TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds((((2 * i) + 1) * totalMilliseconds) / (2 * numberFramesToThumbnail))); Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Capture the first frame as a baseline Di2015NewLine            RenderBitmapAndCapturePixels(previousFramePixels);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Seek to the first thumbnail position Di2015NewLine            SeekToNextThumbnailPosition();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void HandleMediaPlayerChanged(Object ^sender, EventArgs ^e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If still processing the file (i.e., not done)... Di2015NewLine            if (GetProcessing(this))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Capture the current frame Di2015NewLine                CaptureCurrentFrame(false);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private:Di2015NewLine        void InitializeInstanceFields()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _mediaPlayer = gcnew MediaPlayer();Di2015NewLine            _positionsToThumbnail = gcnew Queue<TimeSpan>();Di2015NewLine            _watchdogTimer = gcnew DispatcherTimer();Di2015NewLine            m_iContrast = 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine#pragma endregion Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12683513Di2015UniqueSeparator// Returns a one-based line number and column of the selection startDi2015NewLineprivate static Tuple<int, int> GetPosition(TextBox text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Selection start always reports the position as though newlines are one characterDi2015NewLine    string contents = text.Text.Replace(Environment.NewLine, "\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int i, pos = 0, line = 1;Di2015NewLine    // Loop through all the lines up to the selection startDi2015NewLine    while ((i = contents.IndexOf('\\n', pos, text.SelectionStart - pos)) != -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pos = i + 1;Di2015NewLine        line++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Column is the remaining charactersDi2015NewLine    int column = text.SelectionStart - pos + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Tuple.Create(line, column);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12685279Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression<Func<Tab, bool>> leftexp = tag => ((tag.id == 2) || (tag.id == 3));Di2015NewLineExpression<Func<Tab, bool>> rightexp = tag => ((tag.uid == "MU") || (tag.uid == "ST"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineExpression binaryexp = Expression.AndAlso(leftexp.Body, rightexp.Body);Di2015NewLineParameterExpression[] parameters = new ParameterExpression[1] {Di2015NewLine    Expression.Parameter(typeof(Tab), leftexp.Parameters.First().Name)Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineExpression<Func<Tab, bool>> lambdaExp = Expression.Lambda<Func<Tab, bool>>(binaryexp, parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar lambda = lambdaExp.Compile();Di2015NewLine

12685321Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetData
12685321Di2015UniqueSeparatorStringBuilder
12685321Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GetData(string userName, DateTime fromDate, DateTime toDate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     var userElement = xDox.Descendants("User")Di2015NewLine            .SingleOrDefault(u => u.Element("Name").Value == userName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (userElement != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = userElement.Descendants("Attempts")Di2015NewLine            .Select(a => newDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Place = a.Element("Place").Value,Di2015NewLine                    Date = DateTime.Parse(a.Element("Date").Value),Di2015NewLine                    Distance = int.Parse(a.Element("Distance").Value)Di2015NewLine                })Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            .Where(a => a.Date >= fromDateDi2015NewLine                        && a.Date <= toDate)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            .GroupBy(a => a.Place)Di2015NewLine            .Select(g => new {Place = g.Key, Avg = g.Average(x => x.Distance)});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        builder.AppendFormat("User:{0}", userName);Di2015NewLine        builder.AppendLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        builder.AppendFormat("Date:{0} to {1}", fromDate, toDate);Di2015NewLine        builder.AppendLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var item in result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            builder.AppendFormat("Average Distance in {0}: {1}", Di2015NewLine                                               item.Place, item .Avg);Di2015NewLine            builder.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12691639Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void getEmailCount(Action<int> callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int unreadCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FolderView viewFolders = new FolderView(int.MaxValue) { Traversal = FolderTraversal.Deep, PropertySet = new PropertySet(BasePropertySet.IdOnly) };Di2015NewLine        ItemView viewEmails = new ItemView(int.MaxValue) { PropertySet = new PropertySet(BasePropertySet.IdOnly) };Di2015NewLine        SearchFilter unreadFilter = new SearchFilter.SearchFilterCollection(LogicalOperator.And, new SearchFilter.IsEqualTo(EmailMessageSchema.IsRead, false));Di2015NewLine        SearchFilter folderFilter = new SearchFilter.SearchFilterCollection(LogicalOperator.And, new SearchFilter.IsEqualTo(FolderSchema.DisplayName, "AllItems"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FindFoldersResults inboxFolders = service.FindFolders(WellKnownFolderName.Root, folderFilter, viewFolders);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (inboxFolders.Count() == 0)//if we don't have AllItems folderDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //search all items in Inbox and subfoldersDi2015NewLine            FindItemsResults<Item> findResults = service.FindItems(WellKnownFolderName.Inbox, unreadFilter, viewEmails);Di2015NewLine            unreadCount += findResults.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            inboxFolders = service.FindFolders(WellKnownFolderName.Inbox, viewFolders);Di2015NewLine            foreach (Folder folder in inboxFolders.Folders)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                findResults = service.FindItems(folder.Id, unreadFilter, viewEmails);Di2015NewLine                unreadCount += findResults.Count();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else //AllItems is avilableDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Folder folder in inboxFolders.Folders)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FindItemsResults<Item> findResults = service.FindItems(folder.Id, unreadFilter, viewEmails);Di2015NewLine                unreadCount += findResults.Count();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        callback(unreadCount);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12691929Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Pipeline.Wrapper;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Wrapper;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Pipeline.SSISScriptComponentEntryPointAttribute]Di2015NewLinepublic class ScriptMain : UserComponentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Our LINQ-able thing.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    List<Data> data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Do our preexecute tasks, in particular, we will instantiateDi2015NewLine    /// our collection.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public override void PreExecute()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.PreExecute();Di2015NewLine        this.data = new List<Data>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This method is called once the last row has hit.Di2015NewLine    /// Since we will can only find the highest OneToManyDataIdDi2015NewLine    /// after receiving all the rows, this the only time we canDi2015NewLine    /// send rows to the output buffer.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public override void FinishOutputs()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.FinishOutputs();Di2015NewLine        CreateNewOutputRows();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Accumulate all the input rows into an internal LINQ-ableDi2015NewLine    /// collectionDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="Row">The buffer holding the current row</param>Di2015NewLine    public override void Input0_ProcessInputRow(Input0Buffer Row)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // there is probably a more graceful mechanism of spinningDi2015NewLine        // up this struct.Di2015NewLine        // You must also worry about fields that have null types.Di2015NewLine        Data d = new Data();Di2015NewLine        d.ID = Row.ID;Di2015NewLine        d.Title = Row.Title;Di2015NewLine        d.OneToManyId = Row.OneToManyDataID;            Di2015NewLine        this.data.Add(d);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This is the process to generate new rows. As we only want toDi2015NewLine    /// generate rows once all the rows have arrived, only call thisDi2015NewLine    /// at the point our internal collection has accumulated all theDi2015NewLine    /// input rows.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public override void CreateNewOutputRows()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in this.data.GroupBy(d => d.ID).Select(d => new { Item = d.Key }))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Then pick out the highest OneToMany ID for that row to use with it.Di2015NewLine            // Magic happensDi2015NewLine            // I don't "get" LINQ so I can't implement the poster's actionDi2015NewLine            int id = 0;Di2015NewLine            int maxOneToManyID = 2;Di2015NewLine            string title = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            id = item.Item;Di2015NewLine            Output0Buffer.AddRow();Di2015NewLine            Output0Buffer.ID = id;Di2015NewLine            Output0Buffer.OneToManyDataID = maxOneToManyID;Di2015NewLine            Output0Buffer.Title = title;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// I think this works well enough to demoDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic struct DataDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int ID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Title { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int OneToManyId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12697560Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool PropertyHasValue(object obj, string propertyName, string propertyValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(obj != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo prop = obj.GetType().GetProperty(propertyName, BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLine            if(prop != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object val = prop.GetValue(obj,null);Di2015NewLine                string sVal = Convert.ToString(val);Di2015NewLine                if(sVal == propertyValue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Debug.Log (obj.GetType().FullName + "Has the Value" + propertyValue);Di2015NewLine                    return true;    Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Debug.Log ("No property with this value");Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Log ("An error occurred.");Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12699436Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MasterClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, HookObj> dict = new Dictionary<string, HookObj>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Data came in from an external source, see if we know what variable to assign the value toDi2015NewLine    public void receiveData(string key, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dict.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine            assignVal(dict[key], value);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException(); //use NotImplementedException as placeholder until we make proper exceptionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Cast the value-string to the proper type and assign itDi2015NewLine    private void assignVal(HookObj hookobj, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (hookobj.theType == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine                hookobj.SetValue(value);Di2015NewLine            else if (hookobj.theType == typeof(int))Di2015NewLine                hookobj.SetValue(Int32.Parse(value));Di2015NewLine            else if (hookobj.theType == typeof(float))Di2015NewLine                hookobj.SetValue(float.Parse(value));Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (RuntimeBinderException ex) { throw new NotImplementedException("", ex); }Di2015NewLine        catch (System.FormatException ex) { throw new NotImplementedException("", ex); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void newHookAndAdd<T>(Action<T> setter, Func<T> getter, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HookObj hook = new HookObj<T>(setter, getter);Di2015NewLine        dict.Add(name, hook);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12699436Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class HookObj<T> : HookObjDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Action<T> setMethod { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public Func<T> getMethod { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HookObj(Action<T> setMethod, Func<T> getMethod)Di2015NewLine        : base(typeof(T))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.setMethod = setMethod;Di2015NewLine        this.getMethod = getMethod;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetValue(object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        setMethod((T)value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object GetValue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return getMethod();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic abstract class HookObjDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Type theType { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HookObj(Type theType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.theType = theType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract void SetValue(object value);Di2015NewLine    public abstract object GetValue();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12699436Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomHook<T> : HookObj<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Func<string, T> inputParser { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CustomHook(Func<string, T> parser)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (parser == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("parser");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.inputParser = parser;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override T Parse(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return inputParser(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12699436Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MasterClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, HookObj> dict = new Dictionary<string, HookObj>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Data came in from an external source, see if we know what variable to assign the value toDi2015NewLine    public void receiveData(string key, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dict.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine            assignVal(dict[key], value);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException(); 12699436Di2015UniqueSeparatorPersonHook
12699436Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PersonHook : HookObj<Person>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override Person Parse(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] parts = value.Split(',');Di2015NewLine        var person = new Person(parts[0], parts[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (person.FirstName == "Bob")Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("You have a silly name and I don't like you.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(person.FirstName))Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("No first name provided.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(person.LastName))Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("No last name provided.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return person;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12701603Di2015UniqueSeparator[TestMethod]Di2015NewLinepublic void RendererRendersEachWidgetByCallingBeginRenderThenEndRender()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Mocks/StubsDi2015NewLine      var orderedResultList = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var space = MockRepository.GenerateStub<ISpace>();Di2015NewLine      space.Stub(s => s.BeginRender(Arg<IWidget>.Is.Anything))Di2015NewLine            .WhenCalled(x => orderedResultList.Add("Begin Render " + ((IWidget)x.Arguments[0]).Id));Di2015NewLine      space.Stub(s => s.EndRender(Arg<IWidget>.Is.Anything))Di2015NewLine            .WhenCalled(x => orderedResultList.Add("End Render " + ((IWidget)x.Arguments[0]).Id));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var world = MockRepository.GenerateStub<IWorld>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var widget1 = MockRepository.GenerateStub<IWidget>();Di2015NewLine      widget1.Stub(w => w.Id).Return("widget1"); // assuming no public setter for this propertyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var widget2 = MockRepository.GenerateStub<IWidget>();Di2015NewLine      widget2.Stub(w => w.Id).Return("widget2"); // assuming no public setter for this propertyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var widgetList = new List<IWidget>{ widget1, widget2 };Di2015NewLine      world.Stub(w => w.Widgets).Return(widgetList);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Object under testDi2015NewLine    IRenderer target = new Renderer(world, space);Di2015NewLine    target.Render();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // verify BeginRender is calledDi2015NewLine      space.AssertWasCalled(s => s.BeginRender(Arg<IWidget>.Is.Same(widget1)));Di2015NewLine      space.AssertWasCalled(s => s.BeginRender(Arg<IWidget>.Is.Same(widget2)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // verify EndRender is calledDi2015NewLine      space.AssertWasCalled(s => s.EndRender(Arg<IWidget>.Is.Same(widget1)));Di2015NewLine      space.AssertWasCalled(s => s.EndRender(Arg<IWidget>.Is.Same(widget2)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // verify BeginRender is called before EndRenderDi2015NewLine    var orderedResults = orderedResultList.Select((s, i) => Tuple.Create(i, s));Di2015NewLine    Assert.IsTrue(Di2015NewLine        (orderedResults.Single(x => x.Item2 == "Begin Render " + widget1.Id).Item1) <Di2015NewLine        (orderedResults.Single(x => x.Item2 == "End Render " + widget1.Id).Item1));Di2015NewLine    Assert.IsTrue(Di2015NewLine        (orderedResults.Single(x => x.Item2 == "Begin Render " + widget2.Id).Item1) <Di2015NewLine        (orderedResults.Single(x => x.Item2 == "End Render " + widget2.Id).Item1));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12704634Di2015UniqueSeparatorwindspeed = windspeed - 4 + random (9)  # -4 + 0..8 gives -4..4Di2015NewLineif windspeed > 99:Di2015NewLine    windspeed = 99Di2015NewLineif windspeed < 0:Di2015NewLine    windspeed = 0Di2015NewLine
12704634Di2015UniqueSeparatorwindspeed = 50Di2015NewLinetarget = windspeedDi2015NewLinewhile true:Di2015NewLine    # Only set new target if previous target reached.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if target == windspeed:Di2015NewLine        target = random (100)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    # Move gradually toward target.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if target > windspeed:Di2015NewLine        windspeed = windspeed + max (random (4) + 1, target - windspeed)Di2015NewLine    else:Di2015NewLine        windspeed = windspeed - max (random (4) + 1, target - windspeed)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sleep (1)Di2015NewLine

12706970Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic object[,] ConvertListToObject<T>(IEnumerable<T> DataSource)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int rows = DataSource.Count();Di2015NewLine    //Get array of properties of the type TDi2015NewLine    PropertyInfo[] propertyInfos;Di2015NewLine    propertyInfos = typeof(T).GetProperties(Di2015NewLine        BindingFlags.Public |Di2015NewLine        BindingFlags.Instance); // or .StaticDi2015NewLine    int cols = propertyInfos.Length;Di2015NewLine    //Create object array with rows/colsDi2015NewLine    object[,] excelarray = new object[rows, cols];Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (T data in DataSource) //Outer loopDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < cols; j++) //Inner loopDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            excelarray[i, j] = propertyInfos[j].GetValue(data, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        i++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return excelarray;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

StartPoint.X));Di2015NewLine    SelectionRectangle.Height = Math.Abs((PointWhereMouseIs.Y - StartPoint.Y));Di2015NewLine    foreach (CheckBox ThisChkBox in EditedItems.Children) {Di2015NewLine        object rectBounds = VisualTreeHelper.GetDescendantBounds(ThisChkBox);Di2015NewLine        Vector vector = VisualTreeHelper.GetOffset(ThisChkBox);Di2015NewLine        rectBounds.Offset(vector);Di2015NewLine        if (rectBounds.IntersectsWith(SelectedRect)) {Di2015NewLine            ((TextBlock)(ThisChkBox.Content)).Background = Brushes.LightGreen;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            ((TextBlock)(ThisChkBox.Content)).Background = Brushes.Transparent;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// '' <summary>Di2015NewLine// '' When Left Mouse button is released, change all CheckBoxes values. (Or do nothing if it is a small move -->Di2015NewLine// '' click will be handled in a standard way.)Di2015NewLine// '' </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate void EditedItems_PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp(object sender, System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    PointWhereMouseIs = Mouse.GetPosition(this);Di2015NewLine    Rect SelectedRect = new Rect(StartPoint, PointWhereMouseIs);Di2015NewLine    StartPoint = null;Di2015NewLine    SelectionRectangle.Opacity = 0;Di2015NewLine    //  hide the rectangle againDi2015NewLine    if (((SelectedRect.Width < 20) Di2015NewLine                && (SelectedRect.Height < 20))) {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (CheckBox ThisEditedItem in EditedItems.Children) {Di2015NewLine        object rectBounds = VisualTreeHelper.GetDescendantBounds(ThisEditedItem);Di2015NewLine        Vector vector = VisualTreeHelper.GetOffset(ThisEditedItem);Di2015NewLine        rectBounds.Offset(vector);Di2015NewLine        if (rectBounds.IntersectsWith(SelectedRect)) {Di2015NewLine            ThisEditedItem.IsChecked = !ThisEditedItem.IsChecked;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ((TextBlock)(ThisEditedItem.Content)).Background = Brushes.Transparent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12711972Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Program program = new Program();Di2015NewLine        program.startFeed();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This is run on the main threadDi2015NewLine    public void startFeed()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Start a Timer on a new thread to do work with the ProcessData methodDi2015NewLine        // Pass null to its 'state' argument, wait 0 milliseconds beforeDi2015NewLine        // running it, and run it once every 300000 millisecondsDi2015NewLine        using (new Timer(ProcessData, null, 0, 300000))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The Timer will only exist while we are inside the 'using' block;Di2015NewLine            // stay here with a loopDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Write our status messageDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Waiting for data at {0}...", DateTime.Now);Di2015NewLine                // We don't want this loop running ALL the time; add a smallDi2015NewLine                // delay so it only updates once every secondDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(1000); Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This is run on the background threadDi2015NewLine    private void ProcessData(object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //My Application which i want to run continously Di2015NewLine            //when thread enters in run modeDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception xObj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(DateTime.Now.ToString()Di2015NewLine                + " >> Incoming Message Processing Error. >> "Di2015NewLine                + xObj.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12712436Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction StoreLnkSiteName(sender) {Di2015NewLine    //get handle to parent row:Di2015NewLine    var oRow = sender;Di2015NewLine    while (oRow && oRow.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "tr")Di2015NewLine        oRow = oRow.parentNode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //something might be wrong, sanity check:Di2015NewLine    if (!oRow)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //build array of all possible elements we have to look into:Di2015NewLine    var elements = [];Di2015NewLine    var arrSpans = oRow.getElementsByTagName("span");Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < arrSpans.length; i++)Di2015NewLine        elements.push(arrSpans[i]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //site name is the sender, grab its contents:Di2015NewLine    var siteName = sender.innerHTML;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //find the order ID by looking for matching element:Di2015NewLine    var orderId = "";Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        var element = elements[i];Di2015NewLine        if (element.id.indexOf("lblorderId") >= 0) {Di2015NewLine            orderId = element.innerHTML;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //here you can use the values same way you use in the original code...Di2015NewLine    alert("site name: " + siteName + " and order ID is " + orderId);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12720031Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CheckAllServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Make sure you don't create multiple Di2015NewLine    // instances of this class. Make it a singleton.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Holds all the pending requestsDi2015NewLine    private ConcurrentQueue<object> requests = new ConcurrentQueue<object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private object syncLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Thread checkAllThread;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Requests to Check All. This request is async, Di2015NewLine    /// and will be serviced when all pending requests Di2015NewLine    /// are serviced (if any).Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void RequestCheckAll()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        requests.Enqueue("Process this Scotty...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lock (syncLock)Di2015NewLine        {   // Lock is to make sure we don't create multiple threads.Di2015NewLine            if (checkAllThread == null || Di2015NewLine                checkAllThread.ThreadState != ThreadState.Running)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                checkAllThread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(ListenAndProcessRequests));Di2015NewLine                checkAllThread.Start();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ListenAndProcessRequests()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (requests.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object thisRequestData;Di2015NewLine            requests.TryDequeue(out thisRequestData);Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                CheckAllImpl();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // TODO: Log error ?Di2015NewLine                // Can't afford to fail.Di2015NewLine                // Failing the thread will cause all Di2015NewLine                // waiting requests to delay until another Di2015NewLine                // request come in.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void CheckAllImpl()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException("Check all is not gonna write it-self...");Di2015NewLine        // TODO: Check AllDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12725615Di2015UniqueSeparatorTcpClient
12725615Di2015UniqueSeparatorSub Main()Di2015NewLine    Dim client = New System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient("hostname", 143)Di2015NewLine    Using s = client.GetStream(), Di2015NewLine        reader = New StreamReader(s),Di2015NewLine        writer = New StreamWriter(s)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Dim send As Action(Of String) = Sub(command) Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine(command)Di2015NewLine                writer.Flush()Di2015NewLine            End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Dim recieve As Func(Of String, String) = Function(tag) Di2015NewLine                Dim response As StringDi2015NewLine                Dim str As String = ""Di2015NewLine                response = reader.ReadLine()Di2015NewLine                While response IsNot NothingDi2015NewLine                    str += responseDi2015NewLine                    If response.StartsWith(tag, StringComparison.Ordinal) ThenDi2015NewLine                        Exit WhileDi2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                    response = reader.ReadLine()Di2015NewLine                End WhileDi2015NewLine                Return strDi2015NewLine            End FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            send("a login username password"): recieve("a")Di2015NewLine            send("b select inbox"): recieve("b")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            send("b2 SEARCH UNSEEN")Di2015NewLine            Dim b2response = recieve("b2")Di2015NewLine            Dim items = Regex.Match(b2response, "SEARCH (.*) OK").Groups(1).Value.Split(" "c)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Unread items: " + items.Count().ToString())Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            send("c logout"): recieve("c")Di2015NewLine    End UsingDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine
12725615Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var client = new System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient("hostname", 143);Di2015NewLine    using (var s = client.GetStream())Di2015NewLine    using (var reader = new StreamReader(s))Di2015NewLine    using (var writer = new StreamWriter(s))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Action<string> send = (command) => Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine(command);Di2015NewLine            writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Func<String, String> recieve = (tag) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string response;Di2015NewLine            string str="";Di2015NewLine            while ((response = reader.ReadLine()) != null ) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                str+=response;Di2015NewLine                if (response.StartsWith(tag, StringComparison.Ordinal))Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return str;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        send("a login username password"); recieve("a");Di2015NewLine        send("b select inbox"); recieve("b");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        send("b2 SEARCH UNSEEN");Di2015NewLine        var b2response = recieve("b2");Di2015NewLine        var items = Regex.Match(b2response, @"SEARCH (.*) OK").Groups[1].Value.Split(' ');Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Unread items: " + items.Count().ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        send("c logout"); recieve("c");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12730092Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic T GetScalarValue<T>(string sql)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T result = default(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection("MY_SQL_SERVER_CONNECTION_STRING"))Di2015NewLine        using (SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(sql, conn))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            conn.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var scalar = cmd.ExecuteScalar();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (scalar != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = (T)Convert.ChangeType(scalar, typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // or result = (T)scalar    if that works better for you.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Log the exception maybe?Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12730215Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void WriteFile(int aFileIndex, byte[] sourceBytes, int firstByteIndex, int byteCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string filename = String.Format("output{0}.pvr", aFileIndex);Di2015NewLine        byte[] outputBytes = new byte[byteCount];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(sourceBytes, firstByteIndex, outputBytes, 0, byteCount);Di2015NewLine        File.WriteAllBytes(filename, outputBytes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] fileBytes = File.ReadAllBytes("inputfile");Di2015NewLine        int filesOutput = 0;Di2015NewLine        int startIndex = -1;Di2015NewLine        int currentIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (;;)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int nextIndex = Array.IndexOf(fileBytes, (byte)'G', currentIndex);Di2015NewLine            if (nextIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // There are no more ASCII 'G's in the file.Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (nextIndex + 4 >= fileBytes.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // There aren't enough characters left in the file for thisDi2015NewLine                // to be an ASCII "GBIX" string.Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (fileBytes[nextIndex+1] == (byte)'B' &&Di2015NewLine                fileBytes[nextIndex+2] == (byte)'I' &&Di2015NewLine                fileBytes[nextIndex+3] == (byte)'X')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Found ASCII "GBIX" at nextIndex. Output the previousDi2015NewLine                // complete file, if there is one.Di2015NewLine                if (startIndex != -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Write(filesOutput, fileBytes, startIndex, nextIndex - startIndex);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                filesOutput += 1;Di2015NewLine                startIndex = nextIndex;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            currentIndex = nextIndex + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (startIndex != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WriteFile(filesOutput, fileBytes, startIndex, fileBytes.Length - startIndex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12730487Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<List<Work>> GetCombinations(List<Work> workList,Di2015NewLine                                        double targetSum,Di2015NewLine                                        double threshhold)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return GetCombinations(0,Di2015NewLine                           new List<Work>(),Di2015NewLine                           workList,Di2015NewLine                           targetSum - threshhold,Di2015NewLine                           targetSum + threshhold);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12730487Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<List<Work>> GetCombinations(double currentSum,Di2015NewLine                                         List<Work> currentWorks,Di2015NewLine                                         List<Work> remainingWorks,Di2015NewLine                                         double minSum,Di2015NewLine                                         double maxSum)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Filter out the works that would go over the maxSum.Di2015NewLine    var newRemainingWorks = remainingWorks.Where(x => currentSum + x.Time <= maxSum)Di2015NewLine                                          .ToList();Di2015NewLine    // Create the possible combinations by adding each newRemainingWork to the Di2015NewLine    // list of current works.Di2015NewLine    var sums = newRemainingWorksDi2015NewLine                   .Select(x => newDi2015NewLine                          {Di2015NewLine                              Works = currentWorks.Concat(new [] { x }).ToList(),Di2015NewLine                              Sum = currentSum + x.TimeDi2015NewLine                          })                                Di2015NewLine                   .ToList();Di2015NewLine    // The initial combinations are the possible combinations that areDi2015NewLine    // within the sum range.                   Di2015NewLine    var combinations = sums.Where(x => x.Sum >= minSum).Select(x => x.Works);Di2015NewLine    // The additional combinations get determined in the recursive call.Di2015NewLine    var newCombinations = from index in Enumerable.Range(0, sums.Count)Di2015NewLine                          from combo in GetCombinationsDi2015NewLine                                        (Di2015NewLine                                            sums[index].Sum,Di2015NewLine                                            sums[index].Works,Di2015NewLine                                            newRemainingWorks.Skip(index + 1).ToList(),Di2015NewLine                                            minSum,Di2015NewLine                                            maxSumDi2015NewLine                                        )Di2015NewLine                          select combo;Di2015NewLine    return combinations.Concat(newCombinations).ToList();        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12733695Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic async Task<TResult> GetBulkAsync<T, TResult>(Di2015NewLine    Func<IGetter, Task<T>> selector,Di2015NewLine    Func<IEnumerable<T>, TResult> aggregateSelector) Di2015NewLine        where T : IEnumerable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Task<T>[] tasks = new Task<T>[this.getters.Count];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < this.getters.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tasks[i] = selector(this.getters[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    T[] results = await Task.WhenAll(tasks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return results.Select<T, TResult>(aggregateSelector);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12733944Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int GetMessageCount(string queuePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const string query = "select * from Win32_PerfRawData_MSMQ_MSMQQueue";Di2015NewLine    var query = new WqlObjectQuery(query);Di2015NewLine    var searcher = new ManagementObjectSearcher(query);Di2015NewLine    var queues = searcher.Get();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (ManagementObject queue in queues)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var name = queue["Name"].ToString();Di2015NewLine        if (AreTheSameQueue(queuePath, name))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Depending on the machine (32/64-bit), this value is a different type.Di2015NewLine            // Casting directly to UInt64 or UInt32 only works on the relative CPU architecture.Di2015NewLine            // To work around this run-time unknown, convert to string and then parse to int.Di2015NewLine            var countAsString = queue["MessagesInQueue"].ToString();Di2015NewLine            var messageCount = int.Parse(countAsString);Di2015NewLine            return messageCount;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool AreTheSameQueue(string path1, string path2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Tests whether two queue paths are equivalent, accounting for differencesDi2015NewLine    // in case and length (if one path was truncated, for example by WMI).Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string sanitizedPath1 = Sanitize(path1);Di2015NewLine    string sanitizedPath2 = Sanitize(path2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (sanitizedPath1.Length > sanitizedPath2.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sanitizedPath1.StartsWith(sanitizedPath2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (sanitizedPath1.Length < sanitizedPath2.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sanitizedPath2.StartsWith(sanitizedPath1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sanitizedPath1 == sanitizedPath2;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string Sanitize(string queueName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var machineName = Environment.MachineName.ToLowerInvariant();Di2015NewLine    return queueName.ToLowerInvariant().Replace(machineName, ".");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12734118Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace StringManipulationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string A = "A:001,002,003|B999|C:002,003";Di2015NewLine        string output = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //use pipe character as starting delimiterDi2015NewLine        string[] parts = A.Split('|');Di2015NewLine        foreach (string s in parts)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //split each set by the Name you want to give it,Di2015NewLine            //versus the values you're attaching to that nameDi2015NewLine            string[] nameValue = s.Split(':');Di2015NewLine            //special case if only one name-value pair existsDi2015NewLine            if (nameValue.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output += s + "|";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (nameValue.Length > 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string name = nameValue[0];Di2015NewLine                string[] values = nameValue[1].Split(',');Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    output += (name + values[i] + "|");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }//end foreachDi2015NewLine        //remove final pipe characterDi2015NewLine        if (output.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            output = output.Substring(0, output.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(output);Di2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12734365Di2015UniqueSeparator//load the input fileDi2015NewLine//open with read and sharingDi2015NewLineusing (FileStream fsInput = new FileStream("input.txt", Di2015NewLine    FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read)) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //use streamreader to search for startDi2015NewLine    var srInput = new StreamReader(fsInput);Di2015NewLine    string searchString = "two";Di2015NewLine    string cSearch = null;Di2015NewLine    bool found = false;Di2015NewLine    while ((cSearch = srInput.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (cSearch.StartsWith(searchString, StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            found = true;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!found)Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Searched string not found.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //we have the data, write to a new fileDi2015NewLine    using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(Di2015NewLine        new FileStream("out.txt", FileMode.OpenOrCreate, //create or overwriteDi2015NewLine            FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None))) // write only, no sharingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //write the line that we found in the searchDi2015NewLine        sw.WriteLine(cSearch);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string cline = null;Di2015NewLine        while ((cline = srInput.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine            sw.WriteLine(cline);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//both files are closed and completeDi2015NewLine

12735165Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace BitConverterTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            UInt32 u32 = 0x01020304;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] u32ArrayLittle = {0x04, 0x03, 0x02, 0x01};Di2015NewLine            byte[] u32ArrayBig = {0x01, 0x02, 0x03, 0x04};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (BitConverter.ToUInt32(u32ArrayLittle, 0) != u32)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Failed to convert the Little endian bytes");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Array.Reverse(u32ArrayBig); // convert the bytes to LittleEndian since that is our architecture.Di2015NewLine                if (BitConverter.ToUInt32(u32ArrayBig, 0) != u32)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Failed to convert the Big endian bytes");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Array.Reverse(u32ArrayLittle); // we are on a big endian platformDi2015NewLine                if (BitConverter.ToUInt32(u32ArrayLittle, 0) != u32)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Failed to convert the Little endian bytes");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (BitConverter.ToUInt32(u32ArrayBig, 0) != u32)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Failed to convert the Big endian bytes");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12738605Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Blocker b = new Blocker();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(b.WaitForResult());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BlockerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int TIMEOUT_MILLISECONDS = 5000;Di2015NewLine    private ManualResetEvent manualResetEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string output;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string WaitForResult()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create an event which we can block on until signalledDi2015NewLine        manualResetEvent = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // start work in a new threadDi2015NewLine        Thread t = new Thread(DoWork);Di2015NewLine        t.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // block until either the DoWork method signals it is completed, or we timeout (timeout is optional)Di2015NewLine        if (!manualResetEvent.WaitOne(TIMEOUT_MILLISECONDS))Di2015NewLine            throw new TimeoutException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DoWork()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.AppendFormat("{0}.", i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        output = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // worker thread is done, we can let the WaitForResult method exit nowDi2015NewLine        manualResetEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12740195Di2015UniqueSeparator_process = new ProcessStartInfo(_tsharkPath);Di2015NewLine_process.Arguments = (string.Format("-r {1}{0}{1}  -q -z ip_hosts,tree ", _filePath, "\\""));Di2015NewLine_process.WindowStyle = ProcessWindowStyle.Hidden;Di2015NewLine_process.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine_process.RedirectStandardOutput = true;Di2015NewLine_process.RedirectStandardError = true;Di2015NewLine_process.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLine_process.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine_process.ErrorDialog = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar tsharkProcess = Process.Start(_process);Di2015NewLinevar reader = tsharkProcess.StandardOutput;Di2015NewLinetsharkProcess.WaitForExit(10000);Di2015NewLinevar list = new List<TSharkOutput>();Di2015NewLinevar regTshark = new Regex(@"^\\s*(?<ip>[\\d.:]+)\\s+(?<val>\\d+)\\s+(?<rate>\\d+\\.\\d+)\\s+(?<perc>\\d+\\.\\d+)%", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLineMatch current;Di2015NewLinestring line = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile (!reader.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    if ((current = regTshark.Match(line)).Success)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var shark = new TSharkOutput()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = uint.Parse(current.Groups["val"].Value),Di2015NewLine            rate = decimal.Parse(current.Groups["rate"].Value),Di2015NewLine            percent = decimal.Parse(current.Groups["perc"].Value)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IPAddress.TryParse(current.Groups["ip"].Value, out shark.ip))Di2015NewLine            list.Add(shark); // all good add to the list.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// sorted is an IEnumerable<TSharkOutput> which has been ordered by the percentage in descending orderDi2015NewLinevar sorted = list.OrderByDescending(ts => ts.percent);Di2015NewLine

12741728Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class GoogleMapsAPIProjectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly double PixelTileSize = 256d;Di2015NewLine    private readonly double DegreesToRadiansRatio = 180d / Math.PI;Di2015NewLine    private readonly double RadiansToDegreesRatio = Math.PI / 180d;Di2015NewLine    private readonly PointF PixelGlobeCenter;Di2015NewLine    private readonly double XPixelsToDegreesRatio;Di2015NewLine    private readonly double YPixelsToRadiansRatio;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public GoogleMapsAPIProjection(double zoomLevel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var pixelGlobeSize = this.PixelTileSize * Math.Pow(2d, zoomLevel);Di2015NewLine        this.XPixelsToDegreesRatio = pixelGlobeSize / 360d;Di2015NewLine        this.YPixelsToRadiansRatio = pixelGlobeSize / (2d * Math.PI);Di2015NewLine        var halfPixelGlobeSize = Convert.ToSingle(pixelGlobeSize / 2d);Di2015NewLine        this.PixelGlobeCenter = new PointF(Di2015NewLine            halfPixelGlobeSize, halfPixelGlobeSize);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PointF FromCoordinatesToPixel(PointF coordinates)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var x = Math.Round(this.PixelGlobeCenter.XDi2015NewLine            + (coordinates.X * this.XPixelsToDegreesRatio));Di2015NewLine        var f = Math.Min(Di2015NewLine            Math.Max(Di2015NewLine                 Math.Sin(coordinates.Y * RadiansToDegreesRatio),Di2015NewLine                -0.9999d),Di2015NewLine            0.9999d);Di2015NewLine        var y = Math.Round(this.PixelGlobeCenter.Y + .5d * Di2015NewLine            Math.Log((1d + f) / (1d - f)) * -this.YPixelsToRadiansRatio);Di2015NewLine        return new PointF(Convert.ToSingle(x), Convert.ToSingle(y));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PointF FromPixelToCoordinates(PointF pixel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var longitude = (pixel.X - this.PixelGlobeCenter.X) /Di2015NewLine            this.XPixelsToDegreesRatio;Di2015NewLine        var latitude = (2 * Math.Atan(Math.Exp(Di2015NewLine            (pixel.Y - this.PixelGlobeCenter.Y) / -this.YPixelsToRadiansRatio))Di2015NewLine            - Math.PI / 2) * DegreesToRadiansRatio;Di2015NewLine        return new PointF(Di2015NewLine            Convert.ToSingle(latitude),Di2015NewLine            Convert.ToSingle(longitude));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12742560Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ListExDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Tuple<int, int> BinarySearchWithCount<T>(Di2015NewLine        this IList<T> list, T key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int min = 0;Di2015NewLine        int max = list.Count - 1;Di2015NewLine        int counter = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (min <= max)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            counter++;Di2015NewLine            int mid = (min + max) / 2;Di2015NewLine            int comparison = Comparer<T>.Default.Compare(list[mid], key);Di2015NewLine            if (comparison == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new Tuple<int, int>(mid, counter);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (comparison < 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                min = mid + 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                max = mid - 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Tuple<int, int>(~min, counter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Which returns a tuple with the item and a number of comparisons. Di2015NewLine//Here is how you can use it:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var numbers = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        numbers.AddRange(Enumerable.Range(0, 100000));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var answer = numbers.BinarySearchWithCount(2);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("item: " + answer.Item1);   // item: 2Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("count: " + answer.Item2);  // count: 15Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12747133Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunction GetPrecedents(rInput As Range) As RangeDi2015NewLine' Returns combined range of all precedents of the input range.Di2015NewLineDim rCell As Range, rPrec As Range, rOutput As RangeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    On Error Resume NextDi2015NewLine    For Each rCell In rInputDi2015NewLine        For Each rPrec In rCell.DirectPrecedentsDi2015NewLine            If Not rPrec Is Nothing ThenDi2015NewLine                If rOutput Is Nothing ThenDi2015NewLine                    Set rOutput = rPrecDi2015NewLine                ElseDi2015NewLine                    Set rOutput = Union(rOutput, rPrec)Di2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLine    Set GetPrecedents = rOutputDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

12747967Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpressionVisitor
12747967Di2015UniqueSeparatornew MyExpressionVisitor().GetNumLonelyParameterExpressions(myExpression.Body)Di2015NewLine
12747967Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyExpressionVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int numLonelyParameterExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetNumLonelyParameterExpressions(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        numLonelyParameterExpressions = 0;Di2015NewLine        Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine        return numLonelyParameterExpressions;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Every time we encounter a lonely parameter, increment.Di2015NewLine        numLonelyParameterExpressions++;Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitParameter(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitMethodCall(MethodCallExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Don't visit parameters that have methods called on them.Di2015NewLine         var expr = (node.Object is ParameterExpression)Di2015NewLine            ? Expression.Default(node.Object.Type)Di2015NewLine            : node.Object;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // We need to make sure the arguments are visited though.Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitMethodCall(node.Update(expr, node.Arguments));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitMember(MemberExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine          // Don't visit parameters with member accesses on them.Di2015NewLine          if (node.Expression is ParameterExpression)Di2015NewLine              return Expression.Default(node.Type);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          return base.VisitMember(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitIndex(IndexExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         // Same idea here.Di2015NewLine         var expr = (node.Object is ParameterExpression)Di2015NewLine             ? Expression.Default(node.Object.Type)Di2015NewLine             : node.Object;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         return base.VisitIndex(node.Update(expr, node.Arguments));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12750693Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<bool[]> GetOperators(int vars)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<bool[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < 1 << vars-1; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var item = new bool[vars - 1];Di2015NewLine        for (var j = 0; j < vars-1; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            item[j] = ((i >> j) & 1) != 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        result.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12750693Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate double Combine(double[] vars, bool[] combination)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sum = vars[0];Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 1; i< vars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sum = combination[i - 1] ? sum + vars[i] : sum - vars[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sum;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

"+" : "-", vars[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12750693Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetOperators()
12750693Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<bool[]> GetOperators(int vars)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<bool[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < 1 << vars; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var item = new bool[vars];Di2015NewLine        for (var j = 0; j < vars; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            item[j] = ((i >> j) & 1) != 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        result.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12750693Di2015UniqueSeparatorCombine()
12750693Di2015UniqueSeparatortrue
12750693Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate double[] Combine(double[] vars, double[] increments, bool[] combination)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Assuming here that vars, increments and combination all have the same number of elementsDi2015NewLine    var result = new double[vars.Length];Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < vars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result[i] = combination[i] ? vars[i] + increments[i] : vars[i] - increments[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Returns an array of the vars and increments combined per the given combinationDi2015NewLine    // E.g. if there are 5 vars and the combination is: {true, false, true, true, false}Di2015NewLine    // The result will be {var1 + inc1, var2 - inc2, var3 + inc3, var4 + inc4, var 5 - inc5}Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12750693Di2015UniqueSeparatorFormatCombination()
12750693Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string FormatCombination(double[] vars, double[] increments, bool[] combination)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<string>(vars.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var combined = Combine(vars, increments, combination);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < vars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.Add(string.Format("{0:0.00##} {1} {2:0.00##} = {3:0.00##}", vars[i], combination[i] ? "+" : "-", increments[i], combined[i]));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return string.Join(", ", result.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12750693Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar vars = new[]Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    1.23, // ADi2015NewLine    0.02, // BDi2015NewLine    0.11, // CDi2015NewLine    0.05, // DDi2015NewLine    1.26, // EDi2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar increments = new[]Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    0.04, // incADi2015NewLine    0.11, // incBDi2015NewLine    0.01, // incCDi2015NewLine    0.37, // incDDi2015NewLine    0.85, // incDDi2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var combination in GetOperators(vars.Length))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var combined = Combine(vars, increments, combination);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Perform operation on combined here...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(FormatCombination(vars, increments, combination));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12751045Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate readonly ManualResetEvent _shutdownEvent = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineprivate Thread _thread;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic MyService()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override void OnStart(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _thread = new Thread(MonitorThread)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IsBackground = trueDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override void OnStop()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _shutdownEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine    if (!_thread.Join(5000))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _thread.Abort();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void MonitorThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (!_shutdownEvent.WaitOne(5000))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Process[] pname = Process.GetProcessesByName("PipeServiceName.exe");Di2015NewLine        if (pname.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             // Process has stopped.
