12760000Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass EnumString : IEnumStringDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int E_INVALIDARG = unchecked((int)0x80070057);Di2015NewLine    const int S_OK = 0;Di2015NewLine    const int S_FALSE = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int current;Di2015NewLine    string[] strings;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public EnumString(IEnumerable<string> strings)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.current = 0;Di2015NewLine        this.strings = strings.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Clone(out IEnumString ppenum)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ppenum = new EnumString(strings);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Next(int celt, string[] rgelt, IntPtr pceltFetched)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (celt < 0)Di2015NewLine            return E_INVALIDARG;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int num = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (current < strings.Length && celt != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rgelt[num] = strings[current];Di2015NewLine            current++;Di2015NewLine            num++;Di2015NewLine            celt--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (pceltFetched != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            Marshal.WriteInt32(pceltFetched, num);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (celt != 0)Di2015NewLine            return S_FALSE;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return S_OK;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Reset()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        current = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Skip(int celt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (celt < 0)Di2015NewLine            return E_INVALIDARG;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (strings.Length - current > celt)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            current = strings.Length;Di2015NewLine            return S_FALSE;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        current += celt;Di2015NewLine        return S_OK;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12760528Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring salt = BCryptHelper.GenerateSalt(6);Di2015NewLinevar hashedPassword = BCryptHelper.HashPassword("password", salt);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(BCryptHelper.CheckPassword("password", hashedPassword));Di2015NewLine
12760528Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Hash a password using the OpenBSD bcrypt scheme.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="ArgumentException">Thrown when one or more arguments have unsupported orDi2015NewLine    ///                                     illegal values.</exception>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="input">The password to hash.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="salt">    the salt to hash with (perhaps generated using BCrypt.gensalt).</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The hashed password</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string HashPassword(string input, string salt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (input == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("input");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(salt))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Invalid salt", "salt");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Determinthe starting offset and validate the saltDi2015NewLine        int startingOffset;Di2015NewLine        char minor = (char)0;Di2015NewLine        if (salt[0] != '$' || salt[1] != '2')Di2015NewLine            throw new SaltParseException("Invalid salt version");Di2015NewLine        if (salt[2] == '$')Di2015NewLine            startingOffset = 3;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            minor = salt[2];Di2015NewLine            if (minor != 'a' || salt[3] != '$')Di2015NewLine                throw new SaltParseException("Invalid salt revision");Di2015NewLine            startingOffset = 4;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Extract number of roundsDi2015NewLine        if (salt[startingOffset + 2] > '$')Di2015NewLine            throw new SaltParseException("Missing salt rounds");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Extract details from saltDi2015NewLine        int logRounds = Convert.ToInt32(salt.Substring(startingOffset, 2));Di2015NewLine        string extractedSalt = salt.Substring(startingOffset + 3, 22);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] inputBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes((input + (minor >= 'a' ? "\\0" : "")));Di2015NewLine        byte[] saltBytes = DecodeBase64(extractedSalt, BCRYPT_SALT_LEN);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BCrypt bCrypt = new BCrypt();Di2015NewLine        byte[] hashed = bCrypt.CryptRaw(inputBytes, saltBytes, logRounds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Generate result stringDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        result.Append("$2");Di2015NewLine        if (minor >= 'a')Di2015NewLine            result.Append(minor);Di2015NewLine        result.AppendFormat("${0:00}$", logRounds);Di2015NewLine        result.Append(EncodeBase64(saltBytes, saltBytes.Length));Di2015NewLine        result.Append(EncodeBase64(hashed, (_BfCryptCiphertext.Length * 4) - 1));Di2015NewLine        return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

ÅµÅ?ÅÅÄ");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12767168Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Parent FindParent<Parent>(DependencyObject child)Di2015NewLine            where Parent : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   DependencyObject parentObject = child;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //We are not dealing with Visual, so either we need to fnd parent orDi2015NewLine   //get Visual to get parent from Parent Heirarchy.Di2015NewLine   while (!((parentObject is System.Windows.Media.Visual)Di2015NewLine           || (parentObject is System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D)))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       if (parentObject is Parent || parentObject == null)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           return parentObject as Parent;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       elseDi2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          parentObject = (parentObject as FrameworkContentElement).Parent;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //We have not found parent yet , and we have now visual to work with.Di2015NewLine    parentObject = VisualTreeHelper.GetParent(parentObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //check if the parent matches the type we're looking forDi2015NewLine    if (parentObject is Parent || parentObject == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       return parentObject as Parent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //use recursion to proceed with next levelDi2015NewLine        return FindParent<Parent>(parentObject);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12771295Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TResult> PrevNextZip<T, TResult>(this IEnumerable<T> stream, Func<T, T, T, TResult> selector) where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var enumerator = stream.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine  if (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    T prev = null;Di2015NewLine    T curr = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var next = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine      yield return selector(prev, curr, next);Di2015NewLine      prev = curr;Di2015NewLine      curr = next;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    yield return selector(prev, curr, null);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

12771742Di2015UniqueSeparatorint GetUnorderedness<T>(T[] data) where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    data = (T[])data.Clone(); // don't modify the input data, Di2015NewLine                              // we weren't asked to actually sort.Di2015NewLine    int swapCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    bool isSorted;Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        isSorted = true;Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 1; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(data[i-1].CompareTo(data[i]) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T temp = data[i];Di2015NewLine                data[i] = data[i-1];Di2015NewLine                data[i-1] = temp;Di2015NewLine                swapCount++;Di2015NewLine                isSorted = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } while(!isSorted);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12772763Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static System.Drawing.Bitmap CombineBitmap(Image[] files)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //read all images into memoryDi2015NewLine            List<System.Drawing.Bitmap> images = new List<System.Drawing.Bitmap>();Di2015NewLine            System.Drawing.Bitmap finalImage = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int width = 0;Di2015NewLine                int height = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (Image image in files)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //create a Bitmap from the file and add it to the listDi2015NewLine                    System.Drawing.Bitmap bitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(image);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //update the size of the final bitmapDi2015NewLine                    width += bitmap.Width;Di2015NewLine                    height = bitmap.Height > height ? bitmap.Height : height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    images.Add(bitmap);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //create a bitmap to hold the combined imageDi2015NewLine                finalImage = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(width, height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //get a graphics object from the image so we can draw on itDi2015NewLine                using (System.Drawing.Graphics g = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(finalImage))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //set background colorDi2015NewLine                    g.Clear(System.Drawing.Color.Black); // Change this to whatever you want the background color to be, you may set this to Color.Transparent as wellDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //go through each image and draw it on the final imageDi2015NewLine                    int offset = 0;Di2015NewLine                    foreach (System.Drawing.Bitmap image in images)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        g.DrawImage(image,Di2015NewLine                          new System.Drawing.Rectangle(offset, 0, image.Width, image.Height));Di2015NewLine                        offset += image.Width;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return finalImage;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (finalImage != null)Di2015NewLine                    finalImage.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                throw ex;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //clean up memoryDi2015NewLine                foreach (System.Drawing.Bitmap image in images)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    image.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

12775057Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic virtual T Find(params object[] keyValues)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (keyValues.Length != _keyProperties.Count)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Incorrect number of keys passed to find method");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IQueryable<T> keyQuery = this.AsQueryable<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < keyValues.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var x = i; // nested linqDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        keyQuery = keyQuery.Di2015NewLine        Where(entity => _keyProperties[x].GetValue(entity, null).Equals(keyValues[x]));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return keyQuery.SingleOrDefault();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

    };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var expressions = new List<Expression>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine some magic code hereDi2015NewLine        var combined = SomeMagicHere(expressions);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // show it worksDi2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<List<string>>>(combined);Di2015NewLine        var list = lambda.Compile()();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static Expression SomeMagicHere(List<Expression> expressions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<Expression> blockContents = new List<Expression>();Di2015NewLine        var var = Expression.Variable(typeof(List<string>), "list");Di2015NewLine        blockContents.Add(Expression.Assign(var,Di2015NewLine            Expression.New(typeof(List<string>))));Di2015NewLine        foreach (var expression in 12785700Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid webClient_OpenWriteCompleted(object sender, OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (e.Error == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Stream responseStream = e.Result as Stream;                Di2015NewLine                dynamic obj = e.UserState;Di2015NewLine                MemoryStream memoryStream = obj.Stream as MemoryStream;Di2015NewLine                string fileName = obj.FileName;Di2015NewLine                if (responseStream != null && memoryStream != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string headerTemplate = string.Format("-----------------------------{0}\\r\\n", _boundaryNo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    memoryStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine                    byte[] byteArr = memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                    string data = headerTemplate + string.Format("Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\\"pic\\"; filename=\\"{0}\\"\\r\\nContent-Type: application/octet-stream\\r\\n\\r\\n", fileName);Di2015NewLine                    byte[] header = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(data);Di2015NewLine                    responseStream.Write(header, 0, header.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    responseStream.Write(byteArr, 0, byteArr.Length);Di2015NewLine                    header = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine                    responseStream.Write(byteArr, 0, byteArr.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    byte[] trailer = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(string.Format("-----------------------------{0}--\\r\\n", _boundaryNo));Di2015NewLine                    responseStream.Write(trailer, 0, trailer.Length);                    Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                memoryStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                responseStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
12785700Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string _boundaryNo = DateTime.Now.Ticks.ToString("x");

12786936Di2015UniqueSeparator    static int partition(int[] A)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pivot, i, j;Di2015NewLine        i = 0;Di2015NewLine        j = A.Length-1;Di2015NewLine        pivot = A[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (i < j)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (A[i] < pivot && i < j)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (A[j] > pivot && j > i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                j--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            swap(ref A[i], ref A[j]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return j;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void swap(ref int a, ref int b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int aCopy = a;Di2015NewLine        a = b;Di2015NewLine        b = aCopy;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static int[] QuickSort(int[] A)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int s;Di2015NewLine        int left = 0;Di2015NewLine        int right = A.Length;Di2015NewLine        int[] B, C;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (A.Length == 0 || A.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine            return A;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            s = partition(A);Di2015NewLine            B = new int[s];Di2015NewLine            C = new int[right - s - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = left; i < s; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                B[i - left] = A[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (int i = s + 1; i < right; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                C[i - s - 1] = A[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            B = QuickSort(B);Di2015NewLine            C = QuickSort(C);Di2015NewLine            for(int i = 0; i < s;i++)Di2015NewLine                A[i] = B[i - left];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = s + 1; i < right; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                A[i] = C[i - s - 1];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return A;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

yourtableDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile @rowcount <= 12 -- loop thru each monthDi2015NewLine  beginDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    set @pivotrow = (select top 1 datepart(month, = salary, @employeeid = EmployeeIDDi2015NewLine            from yourtableDi2015NewLine            where datepart(month, effectivedate) = @pivotrowDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if @pivotrow = 0) -1) as varchar(3)) + ''' Di2015NewLine                                        then ' + cast(@currentMonthSalary as varchar(10)) + ' end) as '+ cast(DateName(month, DateAdd(month, @pivotrow, 0) -1) as varchar(3))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            delete from #colsPivot where datepart(month, effectivedate) = @pivotRowDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            set @priorMonthSalary = ''' + cast(DateName(month, DateAdd(month, @rowcount, 0) -1) as varchar(3)) + '''  Di2015NewLine                        then ' +  cast(@priorMonthSalary as varchar(10)) + ' end) as }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static CookieContainer cookies = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static HttpWebRequest GetNewRequest(string targetUrl, CookieContainer SessionCookieContainer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(targetUrl);Di2015NewLine        request.CookieContainer = SessionCookieContainer;Di2015NewLine        request.AllowAutoRedirect = false;Di2015NewLine        return request;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static HttpWebResponse MakeRequest(HttpWebRequest request, CookieContainer SessionCookieContainer, Dictionary<string, string> parameters = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        request.UserAgent = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.52 Safari/536.5Accept: */*";Di2015NewLine        request.Accept = "text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8";Di2015NewLine        request.CookieContainer = SessionCookieContainer;Di2015NewLine        request.AllowAutoRedirect = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine        request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine        string postData = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<String, String> parametro in parameters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (postData.Length == 0)                Di2015NewLine                postData += String.Format("{0}={1}", parametro.Key, parametro.Value);                Di2015NewLine            else                Di2015NewLine                postData += String.Format("&{0}={1}", parametro.Key, parametro.Value);                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] postBuffer = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(postData);Di2015NewLine        using (Stream postStream = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            postStream.Write(postBuffer, 0, postBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse response = request.GetResponse() as HttpWebResponse;Di2015NewLine        SessionCookieContainer.Add(response.Cookies);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 12808047Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar list1 = new List<int>() { 1, 1, 1, 2, 3 };Di2015NewLinevar list2 = new List<int>() { 1, 1, 2, 2, 4 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar grouped1 =Di2015NewLine    from n in list1Di2015NewLine    group n by nDi2015NewLine    into gDi2015NewLine    select new {g.Key, Count = g.Count()};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar grouped2 =Di2015NewLine    from n in list2Di2015NewLine    group n by nDi2015NewLine    into gDi2015NewLine    select new {g.Key, Count = g.Count()};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar joined =Di2015NewLine    from b in grouped2Di2015NewLine    join a in grouped1 on b.Key equals a.KeyDi2015NewLine    select new {b.Key, Count = Math.Min(b.Count, a.Count)};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar result = joined.SelectMany(a => Enumerable.Repeat(a.Key, a.Count));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCollectionAssert.AreEquivalent(new[] {1, 1, 2}, result);Di2015NewLine

12808231Di2015UniqueSeparator///<summary>Di2015NewLine/// This class retrieves the IWin32Window from the current active Office window.Di2015NewLine/// This could be used to set the parent for Windows Forms and MessageBoxes.Di2015NewLine///</summary>Di2015NewLine///<example>Di2015NewLine/// OfficeWin32Window parentWindow = new OfficeWin32Window (ThisAddIn.OutlookApplication.ActiveWindow ()); 12809650Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap Crop(Bitmap bmp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int w = bmp.Width;Di2015NewLine        int h = bmp.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Func<int, bool> allWhiteRow = row =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < w; ++i)Di2015NewLine                if (bmp.GetPixel(i, row).R != 255)Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Func<int, bool> allWhiteColumn = col =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < h; ++i)Di2015NewLine                if (bmp.GetPixel(col, i).R != 255)Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int topmost = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int row = 0; row < h; ++row)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (allWhiteRow(row))Di2015NewLine                topmost = row;Di2015NewLine            else break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int bottommost = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int row = h - 1; row >= 0; --row)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (allWhiteRow(row))Di2015NewLine                bottommost = row;Di2015NewLine            else break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int leftmost = 0, rightmost = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int col = 0; col < w; ++col)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (allWhiteColumn(col))Di2015NewLine                leftmost = col;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int col = w - 1; col >= 0; --col)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (allWhiteColumn(col))Di2015NewLine                rightmost = col;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (rightmost == 0) rightmost = w; // As reached leftDi2015NewLine        if (bottommost == 0) bottommost = h; // As reached top.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int croppedWidth = rightmost - leftmost;Di2015NewLine        int croppedHeight = bottommost - topmost;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (croppedWidth == 0) // No border on left or rightDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            leftmost = 0;Di2015NewLine            croppedWidth = w;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (croppedHeight == 0) // No border on top or bottomDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            topmost = 0;Di2015NewLine            croppedHeight = h;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var target = new Bitmap(croppedWidth, croppedHeight);Di2015NewLine            using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(target))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                g.DrawImage(bmp,Di2015NewLine                  new RectangleF(0, 0, croppedWidth, croppedHeight),Di2015NewLine                  new RectangleF(leftmost, topmost, croppedWidth, croppedHeight),Di2015NewLine                  GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return target;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(Di2015NewLine              string.Format("Values are topmost={0} btm={1} left={2} right={3} croppedWidth={4} croppedHeight={5}", topmost, bottommost, leftmost, rightmost, croppedWidth, croppedHeight),Di2015NewLine              ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12810029Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Media;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace so.ExpCalloutDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Interaction logic for MainWindow.xamlDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public partial class MainWindow : WindowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public MainWindow()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void OnRightButtonClick( object sender, RoutedEventArgs e )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AdjustCalloutAnchor( RightButton );Di2015NewLine            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void OnLeftButtonClick( object sender, RoutedEventArgs e )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AdjustCalloutAnchor( LeftButton );Di2015NewLine            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void AdjustCalloutAnchor( FrameworkElement el )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // locate the positions of the callout and the element to point toDi2015NewLine            Point calloutPoint = MyCallout.TransformToAncestor( LayoutRoot ).Transform( new Point( 0, 0 ) );Di2015NewLine            Point elementPoint = el.TransformToAncestor( LayoutRoot ).Transform( new Point( 0, 0 ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double vertOffset = calloutPoint.Y + MyCallout.ActualHeight;Di2015NewLine            double horizOffset = elementPoint.X;Di2015NewLine            if( calloutPoint.X > elementPoint.X )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // increase the horizontal offset if the callout Di2015NewLine                // is to the right of the elementDi2015NewLine                horizOffset += el.ActualWidth;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double vertDistance = ( elementPoint.Y + el.ActualHeight ) - vertOffset;Di2015NewLine            double horizDistance = calloutPoint.X - horizOffset;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // add some cushion between the element and the new AnchorPointDi2015NewLine            int pad = 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // the AnchorPoint is a relative distance based on the actual heightDi2015NewLine            // and width of the callout.Di2015NewLine            double x = ( horizDistance / ( MyCallout.ActualWidth + pad ) ) * -1;Di2015NewLine            double y = ( vertDistance / ( MyCallout.ActualHeight + pad ) ) + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // set the new AnchorPoint locationDi2015NewLine            MyCallout.AnchorPoint = new Point( x, y );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            MyCallout.Content = string.Format( "I'm pointing at {0}", el.Name );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12816662Di2015UniqueSeparator     private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RoutingClient=new TcpClient("127.0.0.1",5765);Di2015NewLine        ServerClient = new TcpClient("127.0.0.1", 5766);Di2015NewLine        rcStream = RoutingClient.GetStream();Di2015NewLine        ScStream = ServerClient.GetStream();Di2015NewLine        //start 2 threadsDi2015NewLine        Thread t1 = new Thread(()=>ExchangePackets(rcStream,ScStream));Di2015NewLine        t1.Start();Di2015NewLine        Thread t2 = new Thread(() => ExchangePackets(ScStream, rcStream));Di2015NewLine        t2.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private  static void ExchangePackets(NetworkStream FirstStream, NetworkStream SecondStream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (FirstStream.CanRead)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    byte[] myReadBuffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine                    StringBuilder myCompleteMessage = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                    MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine                    int numberOfBytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine                    int TotalBytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine                    // Incoming message may be larger than the buffer size. Di2015NewLine                    doDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        numberOfBytesRead = FirstStream.Read(myReadBuffer, 0, myReadBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                        ms.Write(myReadBuffer, TotalBytesRead, numberOfBytesRead);Di2015NewLine                        myCompleteMessage.AppendFormat("{0}", Encoding.ASCII.GetString(myReadBuffer, 0, numberOfBytesRead));Di2015NewLine                        TotalBytesRead = TotalBytesRead + numberOfBytesRead;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    while (FirstStream.DataAvailable);Di2015NewLine                    MessageBox.Show("You received the following message : " +Di2015NewLine                                                 myCompleteMessage);Di2015NewLine                    if (SecondStream.CanWrite)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        byte[] myWriteBuffer = ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                        SecondStream.Write(myWriteBuffer, 0, myWriteBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        MessageBox.Show("Sorry.  You cannot write to this NetworkStream.");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    MessageBox.Show("Sorry.  You cannot read from this NetworkStream.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show("Routing to Server:" + ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12817106Di2015UniqueSeparator static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (isFireFoxOpen())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Firefox is open, close it");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string pathOfPrefsFile = GetPathOfPrefsFile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            updateSettingsFile(pathOfPrefsFile);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Done");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void updateSettingsFile(string pathOfPrefsFile)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] contentsOfFile = File.ReadAllLines(pathOfPrefsFile);Di2015NewLine        // We are looking for "user_pref("browser.download.useDownloadDir", true);"Di2015NewLine        // This needs to be set to:Di2015NewLine        // "user_pref("browser.download.useDownloadDir", false);"Di2015NewLine        List<String> outputLines = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (string line in contentsOfFile)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (line.StartsWith("user_pref(\\"browser.download.useDownloadDir\\""))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Found it already in file, replacing");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                outputLines.Add(line);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Finally add the value we want to the endDi2015NewLine        outputLines.Add("user_pref(\\"browser.download.useDownloadDir\\", false);");Di2015NewLine        // Rename the old file preferences for safety...Di2015NewLine        File.Move(pathOfPrefsFile, Path.GetDirectoryName(pathOfPrefsFile) +  @"\\" + Path.GetFileName(pathOfPrefsFile) + ".OLD." + Guid.NewGuid().ToString());Di2015NewLine        // Write the new file.Di2015NewLine        File.WriteAllLines(pathOfPrefsFile, outputLines.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetPathOfPrefsFile()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get roaming folder, and get the profiles.iniDi2015NewLine        string iniFilePath = Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.ApplicationData) + @"\\Mozilla\\Firefox\\profiles.ini";Di2015NewLine        // Profiles.ini tells us what folder the preferences file is in.Di2015NewLine        string contentsOfIni = File.ReadAllText(iniFilePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int locOfPath = contentsOfIni.IndexOf("Path=Profiles");Di2015NewLine        int endOfPath = contentsOfIni.IndexOf(".default", locOfPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int startOfPath = locOfPath + "Path=Profiles".Length + 1;Di2015NewLine        int countofCopy = ((endOfPath + ".default".Length) - startOfPath);Di2015NewLine        string path = contentsOfIni.Substring(startOfPath, countofCopy);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string toReturn = Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.ApplicationData) + @"\\Mozilla\\Firefox\\Profiles\\" + path + @"\\prefs.js";Di2015NewLine        return toReturn;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool isFireFoxOpen()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Process proc in Process.GetProcesses())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (proc.ProcessName == "firefox")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

       [STAThread]Di2015NewLine        public static void Toolbox(string arg)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Program program = new Program();Di2015NewLine program.InstallControl();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (arg.Equals("UnInstall", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                program.UninstallControl();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            program.Revoke();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // to ensure the dte object is actually released, and the devenv.exe process terminates.Di2015NewLine            GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine            GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void InstallControl()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Create an instance of the VS IDE,Di2015NewLine            Type type = EnvDTE.ToolBoxTab myTab = toolbox.ToolBoxTabs.Item("Saino");Di2015NewLine            myTab.Activate();Di2015NewLine            myTab.Delete();Di2015NewLine lpInterfaceInfo)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return 0; //SERVERCALL_ISHANDLEDDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int RetryRejectedCall(IntPtr hTaskCallee, hTaskCallee, int dwTickCount, int dwPendingType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return 2; //PENDINGMSG_WAITDEFPROCESSDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine 12822546Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CaseInsensitiveCompareAttribute : System.Web.Mvc.CompareAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public CaseInsensitiveCompareAttribute(string otherProperty)Di2015NewLine        : base(otherProperty)Di2015NewLine    { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override ValidationResult IsValid(object value, ValidationContext validationContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var property = validationContext.ObjectType.GetProperty(this.OtherProperty);Di2015NewLine        if (property == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new ValidationResult(string.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentCulture, "Unknown property {0}", this.OtherProperty));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var otherValue = property.GetValue(validationContext.ObjectInstance, null) as string;Di2015NewLine        if (string.Equals(value as string, otherValue, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new ValidationResult(this.FormatErrorMessage(validationContext.DisplayName));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12824452Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> CartesianProduct<T>(this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine  IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> emptyProduct = new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() }; Di2015NewLine  return sequences.Aggregate( Di2015NewLine    emptyProduct, Di2015NewLine    (accumulator, sequence) => Di2015NewLine      from accseq in accumulator Di2015NewLine      from item in sequence Di2015NewLine      select accseq.Concat(new[] {item})); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12824709Di2015UniqueSeparatorTabControl
12824709Di2015UniqueSeparator// Extended TabControl which saves the displayed item so you don't get the performance hit of Di2015NewLine// unloading and reloading the VisualTree when switching tabsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Obtained from http://www.pluralsight-training.net/community/blogs/eburke/archive/2009/04/30/keeping-the-wpf-tab-control-from-destroying-its-children.aspxDi2015NewLine// and made a some modifications so it reuses a TabItem's ContentPresenter when doing drag/drop operationsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[TemplatePart(Name = "PART_ItemsHolder", Type = typeof(Panel))]Di2015NewLinepublic class TabControlEx : System.Windows.Controls.TabControlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Holds all items, but only marks the current tab's item as visibleDi2015NewLine    private Panel _itemsHolder = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Temporaily holds deleted item in case this was a drag/drop operationDi2015NewLine    private object _deletedObject = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TabControlEx()Di2015NewLine        : base()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this is necessary so that we get the initial databound selected itemDi2015NewLine        this.ItemContainerGenerator.StatusChanged += ItemContainerGenerator_StatusChanged;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// if containers are done, generate the selected itemDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e"></param>Di2015NewLine    void ItemContainerGenerator_StatusChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.ItemContainerGenerator.Status == GeneratorStatus.ContainersGenerated)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.ItemContainerGenerator.StatusChanged -= ItemContainerGenerator_StatusChanged;Di2015NewLine            UpdateSelectedItem();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// get the ItemsHolder and generate any childrenDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public override void OnApplyTemplate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnApplyTemplate();Di2015NewLine        _itemsHolder = GetTemplateChild("PART_ItemsHolder") as Panel;Di2015NewLine        UpdateSelectedItem();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// when the items change we remove any generated panel children and add any new ones as necessaryDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e"></param>Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnItemsChanged(NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnItemsChanged(e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_itemsHolder == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (e.Action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset:Di2015NewLine                _itemsHolder.Children.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (base.Items.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    base.SelectedItem = base.Items[0];Di2015NewLine                    UpdateSelectedItem();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add:Di2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Search for recently deleted items caused by a Drag/Drop operationDi2015NewLine                if (e.NewItems != null && _deletedObject != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var item in e.NewItems)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (_deletedObject == item)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // If the new item is the same as the recently deleted one (i.e. a drag/drop event)Di2015NewLine                            // then cancel the deletion and reuse the ContentPresenter so it doesn't have to be Di2015NewLine                            // redrawn. We do need to link the presenter to the new item though (using the Tag)Di2015NewLine                            ContentPresenter cp = FindChildContentPresenter(_deletedObject);Di2015NewLine                            if (cp != null)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                int index = _itemsHolder.Children.IndexOf(cp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                (_itemsHolder.Children[index] as ContentPresenter).Tag =Di2015NewLine                                    (item is TabItem) ? item : (this.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem(item));Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            _deletedObject = null;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (e.OldItems != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var item in e.OldItems)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        _deletedObject = item;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // We want to run this at a slightly later priority in case thisDi2015NewLine                        // is a drag/drop operation so that we can reuse the templateDi2015NewLine                        this.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(DispatcherPriority.DataBind,Di2015NewLine                            new Action(delegate()Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (_deletedObject != null)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                ContentPresenter cp = FindChildContentPresenter(_deletedObject);Di2015NewLine                                if (cp != null)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    this._itemsHolder.Children.Remove(cp);Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        ));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                UpdateSelectedItem();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotImplementedException("Replace not implemented yet");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// update the visible child in the ItemsHolderDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e"></param>Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnSelectionChanged(SelectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnSelectionChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        UpdateSelectedItem();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// generate a ContentPresenter for the selected itemDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    void UpdateSelectedItem()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_itemsHolder == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // generate a ContentPresenter if necessaryDi2015NewLine        TabItem item = GetSelectedTabItem();Di2015NewLine        if (item != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CreateChildContentPresenter(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // show the right childDi2015NewLine        foreach (ContentPresenter child in _itemsHolder.Children)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            child.Visibility = ((child.Tag as TabItem).IsSelected) ? Visibility.Visible : Visibility.Collapsed;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// create the child ContentPresenter for the given item (could be data or a TabItem)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="item"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    ContentPresenter CreateChildContentPresenter(object item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (item == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ContentPresenter cp = FindChildContentPresenter(item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (cp != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return cp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // the actual child to be added.  cp.Tag is a reference to the TabItemDi2015NewLine        cp = new ContentPresenter();Di2015NewLine        cp.Content = (item is TabItem) ? (item as TabItem).Content : item;Di2015NewLine        cp.ContentTemplate = this.SelectedContentTemplate;Di2015NewLine        cp.ContentTemplateSelector = this.SelectedContentTemplateSelector;Di2015NewLine        cp.ContentStringFormat = this.SelectedContentStringFormat;Di2015NewLine        cp.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;Di2015NewLine        cp.Tag = (item is TabItem) ? item : (this.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem(item));Di2015NewLine        _itemsHolder.Children.Add(cp);Di2015NewLine        return cp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Find the CP for the given object.  data could be a TabItem or a piece of dataDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="data"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    ContentPresenter FindChildContentPresenter(object data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (data is TabItem)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data = (data as TabItem).Content;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (data == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_itemsHolder == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (ContentPresenter cp in _itemsHolder.Children)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (cp.Content == data)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return cp;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// copied from TabControl; wish it were protected in that class instead of privateDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    protected TabItem GetSelectedTabItem()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object selectedItem = base.SelectedItem;Di2015NewLine        if (selectedItem == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_deletedObject == selectedItem)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TabItem item = selectedItem as TabItem;Di2015NewLine        if (item == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            item = base.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex(base.SelectedIndex) as TabItem;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12825291Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar type1 = new Type1();Di2015NewLinevar type2 = new Type2();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar propMap = new List<Tuple<Expression<Func<Type1, object>>, Expression<Func<TradeStaticAttributesItemModel, object>>>>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new Tuple<Expression<Func<Type1, object>>, Expression<Func<Type2, object>>>(x => x.Prop1, x => x.Prop1),Di2015NewLine        new Tuple<Expression<Func<Type1, object>>, Expression<Func<Type2, object>>>(x => x.Prop2, x => x.Prop2)Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var prop in propMap)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (prop.Item1.Compile()(type1) != prop.Item2.Compile()(type2))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression valueParameterExpression = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This handles nullable typesDi2015NewLine        Expression targetExpression = prop.Item1.Body is UnaryExpression ? 12825374Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace CE0721aDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class Tut4_7Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public void run() Di2015NewLine          { Di2015NewLine            double under16_Free = 2.5; Di2015NewLine            double oap = 3.0; Di2015NewLine            double other = 5.0; Di2015NewLine            int groupSize = 0; Di2015NewLine            double totalCost = 0; Di2015NewLine            int age = 0; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (age!=-1) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Enter an Age or -1 to quit"); Di2015NewLine            age=int.Parse(Console.ReadLine()); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if((age<16)&&(age>-1))Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                groupSize++; Di2015NewLine                totalCost = totalCost + under16_Free; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            else if(age>16) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                groupSize++; Di2015NewLine                totalCost = totalCost + oap; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            else if((age>16)&&(age<=65))Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                groupSize++; Di2015NewLine                totalCost = totalCost + other; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        if (groupSize>6) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            totalCost = totalCost - (totalCost/5); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Total Cost = " + totalCost); Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12826243Di2015UniqueSeparator// C# example that shows how to communicate with a second serial portDi2015NewLine#template(simple)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineconst string LOAD_PORT = "COM9";Di2015NewLineconst int MAX_SPEED = 20000;Di2015NewLineconst int TARGET_PRESSURE = 1000; // in thousandths of a poundDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// set up load cell on serial portDi2015NewLineusing (var port = new System.IO.Ports.SerialPort())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    port.PortName = "COM9";Di2015NewLine    port.BaudRate = 9600;Di2015NewLine    port.ReadTimeout = 500;Di2015NewLine    port.WriteTimeout = 500;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    port.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    port.WriteLine("ct0\\r");Di2015NewLine    port.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while ( ! IsCanceled)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        port.WriteLine("o0w1\\r");Di2015NewLine        var pressure = Int32.Parse(port.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine        int velocity = (pressure - TARGET_PRESSURE) * 20;Di2015NewLine        int speed = Math.Min(Math.Abs(velocity), MAX_SPEED);Di2015NewLine        velocity = speed * Math.Sign(velocity);Di2015NewLine        Conversation.Device.Send(Command.MoveAtConstantSpeed, velocity);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12826243Di2015UniqueSeparatorct0

12826747Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction startBuild(array $array, SimpleXMLElement $xml, $no = 0) {Di2015NewLine    $child = hasChildren($array, $no);Di2015NewLine    if (empty($child))Di2015NewLine        return "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach ( $child as $value ) {Di2015NewLine        $xChild = $xml->addChild("object");Di2015NewLine        $xChild->addAttribute("id", $value['id']);Di2015NewLine        $xChild->addAttribute("value", $value['value']);Di2015NewLine        startBuild($array, $xChild, $value['id']);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction hasChildren($array, $id) {Di2015NewLine    return array_filter($array, function ($var) use($id) {Di2015NewLine        return $var['parent'] == $id;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Employee{}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class AddressDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string PostalCode { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class OrderByStringDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IOrderedQueryable<T> OrderBy<T>(this IQueryable<T> source, string property)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ApplyOrder<T>(source, property, "OrderBy");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IOrderedQueryable<T> ApplyOrder<T>(IQueryable<T> source, string property, string methodName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] props = property.Split('.');Di2015NewLine        Type type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression arg = Expression.Parameter(type, "x");Di2015NewLine        Expression expr = arg;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string prop in props)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // use reflection (not ComponentModel) to mirror LINQDi2015NewLine            PropertyInfo pi = type.GetPublicProperties().FirstOrDefault(c => c.Name == prop);Di2015NewLine            if (pi != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                expr = Expression.Property(expr, pi);Di2015NewLine                type = pi.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else { throw new ArgumentNullException(); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Type delegateType = typeof(Func<,>).MakeGenericType(typeof(T), type);Di2015NewLine        LambdaExpression lambda = Expression.Lambda(delegateType, expr, arg);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object result = typeof(Queryable).GetMethods().Single(Di2015NewLine                method => method.Name == methodNameDi2015NewLine                        && method.IsGenericMethodDefinitionDi2015NewLine                        && method.GetGenericArguments().Length == 2Di2015NewLine                        && method.GetParameters().Length == 2)Di2015NewLine                .MakeGenericMethod(typeof(T), type)Di2015NewLine                .Invoke(null, new object[] { source, lambda });Di2015NewLine        return (IOrderedQueryable<T>)result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static PropertyInfo[] GetPublicProperties(this Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (type.IsInterface)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var propertyInfos = new List<PropertyInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var considered = new List<Type>();Di2015NewLine            var queue = new Queue<Type>();Di2015NewLine            considered.Add(type);Di2015NewLine            queue.Enqueue(type);Di2015NewLine            while (queue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var subType = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var subInterface in subType.GetInterfaces())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (considered.Contains(subInterface)) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    considered.Add(subInterface);Di2015NewLine                    queue.Enqueue(subInterface);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var typeProperties = subType.GetProperties(Di2015NewLine                    BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchyDi2015NewLine                    | BindingFlags.PublicDi2015NewLine                    | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var newPropertyInfos = typePropertiesDi2015NewLine                    .Where(x => !propertyInfos.Contains(x));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                propertyInfos.InsertRange(0, newPropertyInfos);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return propertyInfos.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return type.GetProperties(BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchyDi2015NewLine            | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12832599Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Clump<T>(this IEnumerable<T> items, int clumpSize) { Di2015NewLine    T[] ar = new T[clumpSize];Di2015NewLine    int i=0;Di2015NewLine    foreach(var item in items) {Di2015NewLine        ar[i++] = item;Di2015NewLine        if (i == clumpSize) {Di2015NewLine            yield return ar;Di2015NewLine            i = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (i > 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return ar.Take(i);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12834085Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<Account> ReadAccounts(TextReader source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ser = new XmlSerializer(typeof(Account));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var reader = XmlReader.Create(source))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!reader.IsStartElement("BillingFile"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        reader.Read();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (reader.MoveToContent() == XmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return (Account) ser.Deserialize(reader);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12834085Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void WriteAccounts(IEnumerable<Account> data, TextWriter target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Use XmlSerializerNamespaces to supress xmlns:xsi and xmlns:xsdDi2015NewLine    var namespaces = new XmlSerializerNamespaces();Di2015NewLine    namespaces.Add("", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var ser = new XmlSerializer(typeof(Account));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var writer = XmlWriter.Create(target))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteStartElement("BillingFile");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var acct in data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ser.Serialize(writer, acct, namespaces);Di2015NewLine            writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        writer.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12834085Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AccountWriter : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private XmlWriter _writer;Di2015NewLine    private XmlSerializer _ser;Di2015NewLine    private XmlSerializerNamespaces _namespaces;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool _wroteHeader = false;Di2015NewLine    private bool _disposed = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsDisposed { get { return _disposed; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public AccountWriter(TextWriter target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _namespaces = new XmlSerializerNamespaces();Di2015NewLine        _namespaces.Add("", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _ser = new XmlSerializer(typeof(Account));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _writer = XmlWriter.Create(target);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Write(Account acct)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_disposed) throw new ObjectDisposedException("AccountWriter");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!_wroteHeader)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _writer.WriteStartElement("BillingFile");Di2015NewLine            _wroteHeader = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _ser.Serialize(_writer, acct, _namespaces);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Flush()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_disposed) throw new ObjectDisposedException("AccountWriter");Di2015NewLine        _writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_disposed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_wroteHeader)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _writer.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine                _wroteHeader = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _writer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            _disposed = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12836555Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetForegroundWindow

12836974Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static string RemoveUnwantedTags(string data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var document = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLine    document.LoadHtml(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var nodes = new Queue<HtmlNode>(document.DocumentNode.SelectNodes("./*|./text()"));Di2015NewLine    while(nodes.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var node = nodes.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        var parentNode = node.ParentNode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(node.Name != "strong" && node.Name != "em" && node.Name != "u" && node.Name != "#text")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var childNodes = node.SelectNodes("./*|./text()");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (childNodes != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var child in childNodes)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    nodes.Enqueue(child);Di2015NewLine                    parentNode.InsertBefore(child, node);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            parentNode.RemoveChild(node);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return document.DocumentNode.InnerHtml;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12838888Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main (string[] args) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    int k = 0; Di2015NewLine    int i = 3; Di2015NewLine    var loopRes = Parallel.For (0, 20, (J, loopState) => Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        try { k = i / J; }Di2015NewLine        catch { loopState.Break(); }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine ("Result After division " + J + " = " + k); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    ); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (loopRes.IsCompleted) { Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine ("Loop was successful"); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    if (loopRes.LowestBreakIteration.HasValue) { Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine ("loopRes.LowestBreakIteration.Value = " + loopRes.LowestBreakIteration.Value); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLine

12838966Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static T FromXml<T>(string xml)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       string convertedXml = AddNilAttributesToNullableTypesWithNullValues(typeof(T), xml);Di2015NewLine       var reader = new StringReader(convertedXml);Di2015NewLine       var serializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof (T));Di2015NewLine       var data = (T) serializer.Deserialize(reader);Di2015NewLine       reader.Close();Di2015NewLine       return data;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string AddNilAttributesToNullableTypesWithNullValues(Type type, string xml)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(xml))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XDocument doc = XDocument.Parse(xml);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (doc.Root != null)Di2015NewLine                AddNilAttributesToNullableTypesWithNullValues(doc.Root, type);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result = doc.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            result = xml;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void AddNilAttributesToNullableTypesWithNullValues(XElement element, Type type)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         if (type == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("type");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if (element == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("element");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //If this type can be null and it does not have a value, add or update nil attributeDi2015NewLine         //with a value of true.Di2015NewLine         if (IsReferenceOrNullableType(type) && string.IsNullOrEmpty(element.Value))Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            XAttribute existingNilAttribute = element.Attributes().FirstOrDefault(a => a.Name.LocalName == NIL_ATTRIBUTE_NAME);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (existingNilAttribute == null)Di2015NewLine               element.Add(NilAttribute);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine               existingNilAttribute.SetValue(true);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         elseDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            //Process all of the objects' properties that have a corresponding child element.Di2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyInfo property in type.GetProperties())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               string elementName = GetElementNameByPropertyInfo(property);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               foreach (XElement childElement in element.Elements().Where(e =>Di2015NewLine                  e.Name.LocalName.Equals(elementName)))Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                  AddNilAttributesToNullableTypesWithNullValues(childElement, property.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine               }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //For generic IEnumerable types that have elements that correspond to the enumerated type,Di2015NewLine            //process the each element.Di2015NewLine            if (IsGenericEnumerable(type))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               Type enumeratedType = GetEnumeratedType(type);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               if (enumeratedType != null)Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                  IEnumerable<XElement> enumeratedElements = element.Elements().Where(e =>Di2015NewLine                     e.Name.LocalName.Equals(enumeratedType.Name));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  foreach (XElement enumerableElement in enumeratedElements)Di2015NewLine                     AddNilAttributesToNullableTypesWithNullValues(enumerableElement, enumeratedType);Di2015NewLine               }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      private static string GetElementNameByPropertyInfo(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         string overrideElementName = property.GetCustomAttributes(true).OfType<XmlElementAttribute>().Select(xmlElementAttribute => Di2015NewLine            xmlElementAttribute.ElementName).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine         return overrideElementName ?? property.Name;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      private static Type GetEnumeratedType(Type type)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         Type enumerableType = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         Type[] types = type.GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if (types.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine            enumerableType = types[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         return enumerableType;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      public static bool IsGenericEnumerable(Type type)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         return type.IsGenericType && type.GetInterfaces().Any(i => Di2015NewLine            i.IsGenericType && i.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(IEnumerable<>));Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      private static bool IsReferenceOrNullableType(Type type)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         return !type.IsValueType || Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(type) != null;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      private const string NIL_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = "nil";Di2015NewLine      private const string XML_SCHEMA_NAMESPACE = "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      private static XAttribute NilAttributeDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         getDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             if (_nilAttribute == null)Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                 XNamespace xmlSchemaNamespace = XNamespace.Get(XML_SCHEMA_NAMESPACE);Di2015NewLine                 _nilAttribute = new XAttribute(xmlSchemaNamespace + NIL_ATTRIBUTE_NAME, true);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _nilAttribute;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

12849373Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const string kvPair   = @"(?<pair>(?<key>.*?)\\s*=\\s*(?<value>.*?))";Di2015NewLine    const string kvpRegex = "^" + kvPair + "$";Di2015NewLine    const string csRegex  = @"^\\s*(?<cs>(?:" + kvPair + @"\\s*(;\\s*|\\s*$))+)$";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const string input = @"Data Source=Instance1;User ID=;Initial Catalog=DB;Provider=SQLOLEDB.1;Integrated Security=SSPI;Auto Translate=False;";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var match = Regex.Match(input, csRegex);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("======\\nSuccess: {0}\\n======", match.Success);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // 'smart' dictionary from the subcaptures:Di2015NewLine        var dict = match.Groups["pair"]Di2015NewLine            .CapturesDi2015NewLine            .Cast<Capture>()Di2015NewLine            .Select(cap => Regex.Match(cap.Value, kvpRegex))Di2015NewLine            .ToDictionary(submatch => submatch.Groups["key"].Value,Di2015NewLine                          submatch => submatch.Groups["value"].Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var kvp in dict)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(kvp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Getting just the DB1:Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("======\\nCatalog: {0}\\n======", dict["Initial Catalog"]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // raw access from csRegex full match:Di2015NewLine        foreach (Capture cap in match.Groups["key"].Captures)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Key: '{0}'", cap.Value);Di2015NewLine        foreach (Capture cap in match.Groups["value"].Captures)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Value: '{0}'", cap.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("======\\nConnection string: '{0}'", match.Groups["cs"].Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12849373Di2015UniqueSeparator======Di2015NewLineSuccess: TrueDi2015NewLine======Di2015NewLine[Data Source, Instance1]Di2015NewLine[User ID, ]Di2015NewLine[Initial Catalog, DB]Di2015NewLine[Provider, SQLOLEDB.1]Di2015NewLine[Integrated Security, SSPI]Di2015NewLine[Auto Translate, False]Di2015NewLine======Di2015NewLineCatalog: DBDi2015NewLine======Di2015NewLineKey: 'Data Source'Di2015NewLineKey: 'User ID'Di2015NewLineKey: 'Initial Catalog'Di2015NewLineKey: 'Provider'Di2015NewLineKey: 'Integrated Security'Di2015NewLineKey: 'Auto Translate'Di2015NewLineValue: 'Instance1'Di2015NewLineValue: ''Di2015NewLineValue: 'DB'Di2015NewLineValue: 'SQLOLEDB.1'Di2015NewLineValue: 'SSPI'Di2015NewLineValue: 'False'Di2015NewLine======Di2015NewLineConnection string: 'Data Source=Instance1;User ID=;Initial Catalog=DB;Provider=SQLOLEDB.1;Integrated Security=SSPI;Auto Translate=False;'Di2015NewLine

12852860Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomEqualityComparer<T> : IEqualityComparer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Func<T, T, bool> _comparison;Di2015NewLine    private Func<T, int> _getHashCode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CustomEqualityComparerDi2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine        Func<T, T, bool> comparison,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, int> getHashCodeDi2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(comparison, null))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("comparison");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (ReferenceEquals(getHashCode, null))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("getHashCode");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           _comparison = comparison;Di2015NewLine           _getHashCode = getHashCode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _comparison.Invoke(x, y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(T obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _getHashCode.Invoke(obj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12856263Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ChangeSPChart(string sTheInput)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sRetMe = new StringBuilder(sTheInput);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sRetMe.Replace('+', '-');Di2015NewLine    sRetMe.Replace('/', '*');Di2015NewLine    sRetMe.Replace('=', '!');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sRetMe.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string FixSPChart(string sTheInput)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sRetMe = new StringBuilder(sTheInput);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sRetMe.Replace('-', '+');Di2015NewLine    sRetMe.Replace('*', '/');Di2015NewLine    sRetMe.Replace('!', '=');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sRetMe.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12856263Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Encrypt(string toEncrypt, bool useHashing)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] keyArray;Di2015NewLine    byte[] toEncryptArray = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(toEncrypt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Configuration.AppSettingsReader settingsReader = new AppSettingsReader();Di2015NewLine    // Get the key from config fileDi2015NewLine    string key = (string)settingsReader.GetValue("SecurityKey", typeof(String));Di2015NewLine    //System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show(key);Di2015NewLine    if (useHashing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MD5CryptoServiceProvider hashmd5 = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine        keyArray = hashmd5.ComputeHash(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key));Di2015NewLine        hashmd5.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        keyArray = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider tdes = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    tdes.Key = keyArray;Di2015NewLine    tdes.Mode = CipherMode.ECB;Di2015NewLine    tdes.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ICryptoTransform cTransform = tdes.CreateEncryptor();Di2015NewLine    byte[] resultArray = cTransform.TransformFinalBlock(toEncryptArray, 0, toEncryptArray.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tdes.Clear();Di2015NewLine    var encrypted = Convert.ToBase64String(resultArray, 0, resultArray.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // here I change itDi2015NewLine    return  ChangeSPChart(encrypted);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// DeCrypt a string using dual encryption method. Return a DeCrypted clear stringDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="cipherString">encrypted string</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="useHashing">Did you use hashing to encrypt this data? pass true is yes</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string Decrypt(string cipherString, bool useHashing)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    cipherString = FixSPChart(cipherString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] keyArray;Di2015NewLine    byte[] toEncryptArray = Convert.FromBase64String(cipherString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Configuration.AppSettingsReader settingsReader = new AppSettingsReader();Di2015NewLine    //Get your key from config file to open the lock!Di2015NewLine    string key = (string)settingsReader.GetValue("SecurityKey", typeof(String));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (useHashing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MD5CryptoServiceProvider hashmd5 = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine        keyArray = hashmd5.ComputeHash(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key));Di2015NewLine        hashmd5.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        keyArray = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider tdes = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    tdes.Key = keyArray;Di2015NewLine    tdes.Mode = CipherMode.ECB;Di2015NewLine    tdes.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ICryptoTransform cTransform = tdes.CreateDecryptor();Di2015NewLine    byte[] resultArray = cTransform.TransformFinalBlock(toEncryptArray, 0, toEncryptArray.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tdes.Clear();Di2015NewLine    return UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetString(resultArray);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
