12857305Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Producer/consumer queue. Used when a task needs executing, itâs enqueued to ensure order, Di2015NewLine/// allowing the caller to get on with other things. The number of consumers can be defined, Di2015NewLine/// each running on a thread pool task thread. Di2015NewLine/// Adapted from: http://www.albahari.com/threading/part5.aspx#_BlockingCollectionTDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class ProducerConsumerQueue : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private BlockingCollection<Action> _taskQ = new BlockingCollection<Action>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ProducerConsumerQueue(int workerCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create and start a separate Task for each consumer:Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < workerCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Task.Factory.StartNew(Consume);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose() Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        _taskQ.CompleteAdding(); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void EnqueueTask(Action action) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        _taskQ.Add(action); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Consume()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This sequence that weâre enumerating will block when no elementsDi2015NewLine        // are available and will end when CompleteAdding is called.Di2015NewLine        // Note: This removes AND returns items from the collection.Di2015NewLine        foreach (Action action in _taskQ.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Perform task.Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12858059Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static long MagnitudeEstimate(BigInteger value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine      var fieldInfo = typeof(BigInteger).GetField("_bits", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine      var arr = (uint[])fieldInfo.GetValue(value);Di2015NewLine      if (arr != null)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine            int totalNumBytes = arr.Length * sizeof(uint);Di2015NewLine            int zeroBytes = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = arr.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                  if (arr[i] == 0)Di2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                        zeroBytes += 4;Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLine                  else if (arr[i] <= 0xFF)Di2015NewLine                        zeroBytes += 3;Di2015NewLine                  else if (arr[i] <= 0xFFFF)Di2015NewLine                        zeroBytes += 2;Di2015NewLine                  else if (arr[i] <= 0xFFFFFF)Di2015NewLine                        zeroBytes += 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (long)((totalNumBytes - zeroBytes) * 2.408239965);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      else return 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

already installed: 1.3.7Di2015NewLine      [PEAR] Console_Getopt - already installed: 1.3.0Di2015NewLine      [PEAR] Structures_Graph- already installed: 1.0.4Di2015NewLine      [PEAR] XML_Util       - already installed: 1.2.1Di2015NewLine      [PEAR] PEAR           - already installed: 1.9.4Di2015NewLine      Wrote PEAR system config file at: /usr/local/etc/pear.confDi2015NewLine      You may want to add: /usr/local/lib/php to your php.ini include_pathDi2015NewLine      /home/pierre/Downloads/PHP/php5.4-20/build/shtool install -c ext/phar/phar.phar /usr/local/binDi2015NewLine      ln -s -f /usr/local/bin/phar.phar /usr/local/bin/pharDi2015NewLine      Installing PDO headers:          /usr/local/include/php/ext/pdo/       */Di2015NewLine/*      Di2015NewLine      enabling the 'thread safety' --enable-maintainer-zts option results in:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          error: 'tsrm_ls' undeclared (first use in this function)Di2015NewLine*/     Di2015NewLine/*Di2015NewLinetsrm_lsDi2015NewLine    TSRM local storage - This is the actual variable name being passed around Di2015NewLine    inside the TSRMLS_* macros when ZTS is enabled. It acts as a pointer to Di2015NewLine    the start of that thread's independent data storage block.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTSRMDi2015NewLine    Thread Safe Resource Manager - This is an oft overlooked, and seldom if Di2015NewLine    ever discussed layer hiding in the /TSRM directory of the PHP source code.Di2015NewLine    By default, the TSRM layer is only enabled when compiling a SAPI which Di2015NewLine    requires it (e.g. apache2-worker). All Win32 builds have this layer Di2015NewLine    enabled enabled regardless of SAPI choice.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineZTSDi2015NewLine    Zend Thread Ssafety - Often used synonymously with the term TSRM. Di2015NewLine    Specifically, ZTS is the term used by ./configure Di2015NewLine    ( --enable-experimental-zts for PHP4, --enable-maintainer-zts for PHP5), Di2015NewLine    and the name of the #define'd preprocessor token used inside the engine Di2015NewLine    to determine if the TSRM layer is being used.    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTSRMLS_??Di2015NewLine    A quartet of macros designed to make the differences between ZTS and Di2015NewLine    non-ZTS mode as painless as possible. When ZTS is not enabled, all Di2015NewLine    four of these macros evaluate to nothing. When ZTS is enabled however,Di2015NewLine    they expand out to the following definitions:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TSRMLS_C tsrm_lsDi2015NewLine        TSRMLS_D void ***tsrm_lsDi2015NewLine        TSRMLS_CC , tsrm_lsDi2015NewLine        TSRMLS_DC , void ***tsrm_ls    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   PHP relies on global variables from resource type identifiers, to Di2015NewLine   function callback pointers, to request specific information such as Di2015NewLine   the symbol tables used to store userspace variables. Attempting to Di2015NewLine   pass these values around in the parameter stack would be more than Di2015NewLine   unruly, it'd be impossible for an application like PHP where it's Di2015NewLine   often necessary to register callbacks with external libraries whichDi2015NewLine   don't support context data.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   So common information, like the execution stack, the function and Di2015NewLine   class tables, and extension registries all sit up in the global Di2015NewLine   scope where they can be picked up and used at any point in the Di2015NewLine   application.    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   For single-threaded SAPIs like CLI, Apache1, or even Apache2-prefork,Di2015NewLine   this is perfectly fine. Request specific structures are initialized Di2015NewLine   during the RINIT/Activation phase, and reset back to their original Di2015NewLine   values during the RSHUTDOWN/Deactivation phase in preparation for Di2015NewLine   the next request. A given webserver like Apache1 can serve up multipleDi2015NewLine   pages at once because it spawns multiple processes each in their own Di2015NewLine   process space with their own independant copies of global data.    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   The trouble starts with threaded webservers like Apache2-worker, or IISDi2015NewLine   where two or more threads trying to run the a request at the same time.Di2015NewLine   Each thread wants to use the global scope to store its request-specificDi2015NewLine   information, and tries to do so by writing to the same Di2015NewLine   storage space. At the least, this would result in userspace variables Di2015NewLine   declared in one script showing up in another. In practice, it leads to Di2015NewLine   quick and disasterous segfaults and completely unpredictable behavior as Di2015NewLine   memory is double freed or written with conflicting information by separateDi2015NewLine   threads.        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLine#pragma include "/usr/local/include/php"Di2015NewLine#pragma include "/usr/local/include/php/main"Di2015NewLine#pragma include "/usr/local/include/php/TSRM"Di2015NewLine#pragma include "/usr/local/include/php/Zend"Di2015NewLine#pragma link "/usr/local/lib/libphp5.so"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#include "gwan.h" // G-WAN exported functionsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#include <stdio.h>Di2015NewLine#include <stdlib.h>Di2015NewLine#include <sys/types.h>Di2015NewLine#include <sys/syscall.h>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#include <php/sapi/embed/php_embed.h>Di2015NewLine#include <php/Zend/zend_stream.h>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic pid_t gettid(void) { return syscall(__NR_gettid); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// PHPDi2015NewLinestatic int ub_write(const char *str, unsigned int str_len TSRMLS_DC)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   puts(str); // this is the stdout output of a PHP scriptDi2015NewLine   return sapi_error(int type, const char * fmt, ...) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void php_set_var(char *varname, char *varval)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   zval *var;Di2015NewLine   MAKE_STD_ZVAL(var);Di2015NewLine   ZVAL_STRING(var, varval, 1);Di2015NewLine   zend_hash_update(&EG(symbol_table), varname, strlen(varname) + 1,Di2015NewLine                    &var, sizeof(zval*), NULL);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic char *php_get_var(char *varname)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   zval **data = NULL;Di2015NewLine   char *ret = NULL;Di2015NewLine   if(zend_hash_find(&EG(symbol_table), varname, strlen(varname) + 1,Di2015NewLine                    (void**)&data) == FAILURE)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      printf("Name not found in $GLOBALS\\n");Di2015NewLine      return "";Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if(!data)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      printf("Value is NULL (not possible for symbol_table?)\\n");Di2015NewLine      return "";Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   ret = Z_STRVAL_PP(data);Di2015NewLine   return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic int 12864559Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NonContigousDictionary<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine//TODO make this implement IEnumerable, IDictionary, and any other relevant interfaces.Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Dictionary<TKey, TValue>[] dictionaries;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly int numDictionaries = 5;Di2015NewLine    public NonContigousDictionary()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dictionaries = Enumerable.Range(0, numDictionaries)Di2015NewLine            .Select(_ => new Dictionary<TKey, TValue>())Di2015NewLine            .ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TValue this[TKey key]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int hash = key.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine            return dictionaries[hash / numDictionaries][key];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int hash = key.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine            dictionaries[hash / numDictionaries][key] = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Remove(TKey key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int hash = key.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        return dictionaries[hash / numDictionaries].Remove(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Clear()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var dic in dictionaries)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dic.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12867876Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class QuestionComparer : IEqualityComparer<Question>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(Question x, Question y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x.Question == y.Question; // assuming that it's a value type like ID (int)Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(Question obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return obj.Question.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12867876Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar comparer = new QuestionComparer();Di2015NewLinevar newQuestions = UpdateList.Except(OriginalList, comparer).ToList();Di2015NewLinevar both = from o in OriginalListDi2015NewLine           join u in UpdateList on o.Question equals u.QuestionDi2015NewLine           select new { o, u };Di2015NewLinevar updatedQuestions = new List<Question>();Di2015NewLineforeach(var x in both)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // modify following accordingly, i take the updated question if the hash contains something, otherwise i use the original questionDi2015NewLine    if(x.u.AnswerHash != null && x.u.AnswerHash.Length != 0)Di2015NewLine        updatedQuestions.Add(x.u);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        updatedQuestions.Add(x.o);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12867906Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class TaskCompletionSourceHolderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly TaskCompletionSource<object[]> m_tcs;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal object Target { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    internal EventInfo EventInfo { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    internal Delegate Delegate { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal TaskCompletionSourceHolder(TaskCompletionSource<object[]> tsc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_tcs = tsc;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetResult(params object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this method will be called from emitted ILDi2015NewLine        // so we can set result here, unsubscribe from the eventDi2015NewLine        // or do whatever we want.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // object[] args will contain argumentsDi2015NewLine        // passed to the event handlerDi2015NewLine        m_tcs.SetResult(args);Di2015NewLine        EventInfo.RemoveEventHandler(Target, Delegate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ExtensionMethodsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Type, DynamicMethod> s_emittedHandlers =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<Type, DynamicMethod>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void GetDelegateParameterAndReturnTypes(Type delegateType,Di2015NewLine        out List<Type> parameterTypes, out Type returnType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (delegateType.BaseType != typeof(MulticastDelegate))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("delegateType is not a delegate");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MethodInfo invoke = delegateType.GetMethod("Invoke");Di2015NewLine        if (invoke == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("delegateType is not a delegate.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ParameterInfo[] parameters = invoke.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine        parameterTypes = new List<Type>(parameters.Length);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            parameterTypes.Add(parameters[i].ParameterType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        returnType = invoke.ReturnType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Task<object[]> FromEvent<T>(this T obj, string eventName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<object[]>();Di2015NewLine        var tcsh = new TaskCompletionSourceHolder(tcs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        EventInfo eventInfo = obj.GetType().GetEvent(eventName);Di2015NewLine        Type eventDelegateType = eventInfo.EventHandlerType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DynamicMethod handler;Di2015NewLine        if (!s_emittedHandlers.TryGetValue(eventDelegateType, out handler))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type returnType;Di2015NewLine            List<Type> parameterTypes;Di2015NewLine            GetDelegateParameterAndReturnTypes(eventDelegateType,Di2015NewLine                out parameterTypes, out returnType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (returnType != typeof(void))Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Type tcshType = tcsh.GetType();Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo setResultMethodInfo = tcshType.GetMethod(Di2015NewLine                "SetResult", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // I'm going to create an instance-like methodDi2015NewLine            // so, first argument must an instance itselfDi2015NewLine            // i.e. TaskCompletionSourceHolder *this*Di2015NewLine            parameterTypes.Insert(0, tcshType);Di2015NewLine            Type[] parameterTypesAr = parameterTypes.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            handler = new DynamicMethod("unnamed",Di2015NewLine                returnType, parameterTypesAr, tcshType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ILGenerator ilgen = handler.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // declare local variable of type object[]Di2015NewLine            LocalBuilder arr = ilgen.DeclareLocal(typeof(object[]));Di2015NewLine            // push array's size onto the stack Di2015NewLine            ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4, parameterTypesAr.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine            // create an object array of the given sizeDi2015NewLine            ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Newarr, typeof(object));Di2015NewLine            // and store it in the local variableDi2015NewLine            ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Stloc, arr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // iterate thru all arguments except the zero one (i.e. *this*)Di2015NewLine            // and store them to the arrayDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i < parameterTypesAr.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // push the array onto the stackDi2015NewLine                ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, arr);Di2015NewLine                // push the argument's index onto the stackDi2015NewLine                ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4, i - 1);Di2015NewLine                // push the argument onto the stackDi2015NewLine                ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg, i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // check if it is of a value typeDi2015NewLine                // and perform boxing if necessaryDi2015NewLine                if (parameterTypesAr[i].IsValueType)Di2015NewLine                    ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Box, parameterTypesAr[i]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // store the value to the argument's arrayDi2015NewLine                ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Stelem, typeof(object));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // load zero-argument (i.e. *this*) onto the stackDi2015NewLine            ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine            // load the array onto the stackDi2015NewLine            ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, arr);Di2015NewLine            // call this.SetResult(arr);Di2015NewLine            ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Call, setResultMethodInfo);Di2015NewLine            // and returnDi2015NewLine            ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            s_emittedHandlers.Add(eventDelegateType, handler);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Delegate dEmitted = handler.CreateDelegate(eventDelegateType, tcsh);Di2015NewLine        tcsh.Target = obj;Di2015NewLine        tcsh.EventInfo = eventInfo;Di2015NewLine        tcsh.Delegate = dEmitted;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        eventInfo.AddEventHandler(obj, dEmitted);Di2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12867906Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic async void Run() {Di2015NewLine    object[] result = await new MyClass().FromEvent("Fired");Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(string.Join(", ", result.Select(arg =>Di2015NewLine        arg.ToString()).ToArray())); // 123, abcdDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyClass {Di2015NewLine    public delegate void TwoThings(int x, string y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyClass() {Di2015NewLine        new Thread(() => {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine                Fired(123, "abcd");Di2015NewLine            }).Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event TwoThings Fired;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12870106Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine    byte b1 = byte.Parse(args[0]);Di2015NewLine    byte b2 = byte.Parse(args[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool borrow = false;Di2015NewLine    for (int mask = 0x01; mask <= 0x80; mask <<= 1) {Di2015NewLine        if ((b2 & mask) > (b1 & mask)) {Di2015NewLine            borrow = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(Convert.ToString(b1, 2).PadLeft(8, '0'));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(Convert.ToString(b2, 2).PadLeft(8, '0'));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("borrowed: {0}", borrow);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
